tableResults.src: Voriconazole had no effect on the Cmax and AUCt of mycophenolic acid (1 g single dose).

tableResults.display_src: His evaluation, including a thorough eye examination and visual field testing, suggests that his symptoms are due to glaucoma.
tableResults.ref: Seine Beurteilung, einschließlich einer gründlichen Augenuntersuchung und Gesichtsfeldtests, legt nahe, dass seine Symptome auf ein Glaukom zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: His evaluation, including a thorough eye examination and visual field testing, suggests that his symptoms are due to glaucoma.

tableResults.display_src: The injury resulted in complete lacerations of the EPL, the small finger EDC, and the ECU, and an incomplete laceration of the EDM.
tableResults.ref: Die Verletzung führte zu vollständigen Rissen des EPL, des kleinen Finger-EDC und des ECU sowie zu einem unvollständigen Riss des EDM.
tableResults.src: The injury resulted in complete lacerations of the EPL, the small finger EDC, and the ECU, and an incomplete laceration of the EDM.

tableResults.display_src: The patient underwent various tests including a complete blood count, CT and PET scans, peripheral blood flow cytometry analysis, and a bone marrow biopsy.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient wurde verschiedenen Tests unterzogen, darunter ein großes Blutbild, CT- und PET-Scans, eine Analyse der peripheren Blutflusszytometrie und eine Knochenmarkbiopsie.
tableResults.src: The patient underwent various tests including a complete blood count, CT and PET scans, peripheral blood flow cytometry analysis, and a bone marrow biopsy.

tableResults.display_src: Further diagnostic imaging, including CT and MRI of the left arm and a CT of the chest, showed an intraosseous mass with a cystic aspect in the proximal and distal third of the humerus and a solid aspect in the middle third.
tableResults.ref: Weitere diagnostische Bildgebung, einschließlich CT und MRT des linken Arms und einer CT des Brustkorbs, zeigte eine intraossäre Raumforderung mit einem zystischen Aspekt im proximalen und distalen Drittel des Humerus und einem soliden Aspekt im mittleren Drittel.
tableResults.src: Further diagnostic imaging, including CT and MRI of the left arm and a CT of the chest, showed an intraosseous mass with a cystic aspect in the proximal and distal third of the humerus and a solid aspect in the middle third.

tableResults.display_src: This discharge summary documents the diagnosis and treatment of a 35-year-old female patient with pSS and autoimmune bicytopenia.
tableResults.ref: Dieser Entlassungsbericht dokumentiert die Diagnose und Behandlung einer 35-jährigen Patientin mit pSS und autoimmuner Bizytopenie.
tableResults.src: This discharge summary documents the diagnosis and treatment of a 35-year-old female patient with pSS and autoimmune bicytopenia.

tableResults.display_src: His evaluation, including an angiogram and stress test, suggests that his symptoms are due to coronary artery disease.
tableResults.ref: Seine Untersuchung, einschließlich eines Angiogramms und eines Stresstests, legt nahe, dass seine Symptome auf eine koronare Herzkrankheit zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: His evaluation, including an angiogram and stress test, suggests that his symptoms are due to coronary artery disease.

tableResults.display_src: His evaluation, including an MRI and neurological assessments, suggests that his symptoms are due to early-stage Parkinson's disease.
tableResults.ref: Seine Untersuchung, einschließlich einer MRT und neurologischen Untersuchungen, legt nahe, dass seine Symptome auf die Parkinson-Krankheit im Frühstadium zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: His evaluation, including an MRI and neurological assessments, suggests that his symptoms are due to early-stage Parkinson's disease.

tableResults.display_src: Three days after admission, a continuous EEG demonstrated non-convulsive status epilepticus, which was treated with lorazepam and levetiracetam loading and maintenance.
tableResults.ref: Drei Tage nach der Aufnahme zeigte ein kontinuierliches EEG einen nicht-konvulsiven Status epilepticus, der mit Lorazepam und Levetiracetam-Belastung und -Erhaltung behandelt wurde.
tableResults.src: Three days after admission, a continuous EEG demonstrated non-convulsive status epilepticus, which was treated with lorazepam and levetiracetam loading and maintenance.

tableResults.display_src: EEG results showed moderate diffuse encephalopathy/moderate diffuse brain dysfunction and observed epileptiform activity arising from the right hemisphere.
tableResults.ref: Die EEG-Ergebnisse zeigten eine mittelschwere diffuse Enzephalopathie/mittelschwere diffuse Hirnfunktionsstörung und beobachteten eine epileptiforme Aktivität, die von der rechten Hemisphäre ausging.
tableResults.src: EEG results showed moderate diffuse encephalopathy/moderate diffuse brain dysfunction and observed epileptiform activity arising from the right hemisphere.

tableResults.display_src: Ultrasonography of the abdomen and ECG were taken and found to be normal.
tableResults.ref: Es wurden eine Ultraschalluntersuchung des Abdomens und ein EKG durchgeführt, die als normal befunden wurden.
tableResults.src: Ultrasonography of the abdomen and ECG were taken and found to be normal.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including the MRI scan, suggests that your symptoms are due to a herniated disc.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich der MRT-Untersuchung, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf einen Bandscheibenvorfall zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including the MRI scan, suggests that your symptoms are due to a herniated disc.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed a significant improvement in your heart condition after the surgery.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat eine deutliche Verbesserung Ihres Herzzustands nach der Operation ergeben.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed a significant improvement in your heart condition after the surgery.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including a colonoscopy, suggests that your symptoms are due to diverticular disease.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich einer Darmspiegelung, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf eine Divertikelerkrankung zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including a colonoscopy, suggests that your symptoms are due to diverticular disease.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including your recent blood work results, suggests that your symptoms are due to anemia.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich Ihrer aktuellen Blutuntersuchungsergebnisse, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf Anämie zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including your recent blood work results, suggests that your symptoms are due to anemia.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including various heart tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to congestive heart failure.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich verschiedener Herztests, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf eine Herzinsuffizienz zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including various heart tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to congestive heart failure.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed that your heart function has returned to normal.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat ergeben, dass sich Ihre Herzfunktion wieder normalisiert hat.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed that your heart function has returned to normal.

tableResults.display_src: Spironolactone and its active metabolites (including 7α -thiomethyl-spironolactone and canrenone) act as specific antagonists of aldosterone, and exert their effects by binding competitively to the mineralocorticoid receptor located in the kidneys, heart and blood vessels.
tableResults.ref: Spironolacton und seine aktiven Metaboliten (inklusive 7α -Thiomethyl-Spironolacton und Canrenon) agieren als spezifische Antagonisten von Aldosteron und üben ihre Wirkung durch kompetetive Bindung an die Mineralokortikoid-Rezeptoren aus, die sich in den Nieren, dem Herzen und den Blutgefäßen befinden.
tableResults.src: Spironolactone and its active metabolites (including 7α -thiomethyl-spironolactone and canrenone) act as specific antagonists of aldosterone, and exert their effects by binding competitively to the mineralocorticoid receptor located in the kidneys, heart and blood vessels.

tableResults.display_src: The echocardiogram showed a weakened heart muscle.
tableResults.ref: Das Echokardiogramm zeigte einen geschwächten Herzmuskel.
tableResults.src: The echocardiogram showed a weakened heart muscle.

tableResults.display_src: When Atripla is co- administered with an anticonvulsant that is a substrate of CYP450 isoenzymes, periodic monitoring of anticonvulsant levels should be conducted.
tableResults.ref: Bei gleichzeitiger Anwendung von Atripla und einem Antikonvulsivum, das ein Substrat der CYP450- Isoenzyme ist, sollte eine periodische Überwachung der Antikonvulsiva-Spiegel durchgeführt werden.
tableResults.src: When Atripla is co- administered with an anticonvulsant that is a substrate of CYP450 isoenzymes, periodic monitoring of anticonvulsant levels should be conducted.

tableResults.display_src: Elderly patients A population pharmacokinetic analysis of patient data indicated a trend for clearance to decrease with age (19% per decade based on Phase III population pharmacokinetic analysis of patients aged 60– 89 years), see section 4.2.
tableResults.ref: Ältere Patienten Eine pharmakokinetische Populationsanalyse von Patientendaten zeigte, dass die Clearance mit steigendem Alter tendenziell abnimmt (um 19% pro Jahrzehnt, basierend auf einer pharmakokinetischen Populationsanalyse von Phase-III-Daten bei Patienten im Alter von 60 bis 89 Jahren), siehe Abschnitt 4.2.
tableResults.src: Elderly patients A population pharmacokinetic analysis of patient data indicated a trend for clearance to decrease with age (19% per decade based on Phase III population pharmacokinetic analysis of patients aged 60– 89 years), see section 4.2.

tableResults.display_src: Neurological examination indicated that clinical signs originated from the central nervous system.
tableResults.ref: Die neurologische Untersuchung ergab, dass die klinischen Symptome vom Zentralnervensystem herrührten.
tableResults.src: Neurological examination indicated that clinical signs originated from the central nervous system.

tableResults.display_src: The x-ray of your ankle indicated a stress fracture, so you will need to limit weight-bearing activities.
tableResults.ref: Die Röntgenaufnahme Ihres Knöchels deutete auf einen Ermüdungsbruch hin, daher müssen Sie Ihre Belastungsaktivitäten einschränken.
tableResults.src: The x-ray of your ankle indicated a stress fracture, so you will need to limit weight-bearing activities.

tableResults.display_src: Used patches still contain some active hormones.
tableResults.ref: Gebrauchte Pflaster enthalten noch aktive Hormone.
tableResults.src: Used patches still contain some active hormones.

tableResults.display_src: Oral contraeptives, thiazides, glucocorticoids, thyroid hormones and beta-sympathomimetics, growth hormone and danazol.
tableResults.ref: Orale Kontrazeptiva, Thiazide, Glucokortikoide, Schilddrüsenhormone und Betasympathomimetika, Wachstumshormon und Danazol.
tableResults.src: Oral contraeptives, thiazides, glucocorticoids, thyroid hormones and beta-sympathomimetics, growth hormone and danazol.

tableResults.display_src: Together, these effects reduce the levels of the hormones in the body, improving the symptoms of the disease.
tableResults.ref: Zusammen genommen senken diese Wirkungen die Konzentrationen der Hormone im Körper und lindern dadurch die Symptome der Erkrankung.
tableResults.src: Together, these effects reduce the levels of the hormones in the body, improving the symptoms of the disease.

tableResults.display_src: We did a thyroid function test to evaluate your thyroid hormones.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Schilddrüsenfunktionstest durchgeführt, um Ihre Schilddrüsenhormone zu bestimmen.
tableResults.src: We did a thyroid function test to evaluate your thyroid hormones.

tableResults.display_src: There is a potential for reduction or increase in the plasma concentrations of phenytoin, phenobarbital and other anticonvulsants that are substrates of CYP450 isoenzymes with efavirenz.
tableResults.ref: Es besteht die Möglichkeit einer Senkung oder Erhöhung der Plasmakonzentrationen von Phenytoin, Phenobarbital und anderen Antikonvulsiva, die Substrate der CYP450-Isoenzyme sind, wenn sie gleichzeitig mit Efavirenz angewendet werden.
tableResults.src: There is a potential for reduction or increase in the plasma concentrations of phenytoin, phenobarbital and other anticonvulsants that are substrates of CYP450 isoenzymes with efavirenz.

tableResults.display_src: Further in vitro studies have revealed that sibutramine has no significant effect on the activity of the major P450 isoenzymes, including CYP3A4.
tableResults.ref: Weitere In-vitro-Untersuchungen haben gezeigt, dass Sibutramin die Aktivität der zentralen P450-Isoenzyme, einschließlich CYP3A4, nicht signifikant beeinflusst.
tableResults.src: Further in vitro studies have revealed that sibutramine has no significant effect on the activity of the major P450 isoenzymes, including CYP3A4.

tableResults.display_src: In human liver S9 fractions, formation of metabolites was independent of NADPH implying any metabolism would be catalysed by cytosolic enzymes.
tableResults.ref: In humanen Leber-S9-Fraktionen erwies sich die Bildung der Metaboliten als NADPH-unabhängig, was vermuten lässt, dass jeglicher Metabolismus durch zytoplasmatische Enzyme katalysiert wird.
tableResults.src: In human liver S9 fractions, formation of metabolites was independent of NADPH implying any metabolism would be catalysed by cytosolic enzymes.

tableResults.display_src: However, increases in liver enzymes and enzymes produced in the muscles were sometimes more commonly reported in patients taking Zeffix (see below).
tableResults.ref: Jedoch wurde von Patienten unter Zeffix häufiger über Anstiege von Leberenzymen und Enzymen, die von den Muskeln produziert werden, berichtet (siehe unten).
tableResults.src: However, increases in liver enzymes and enzymes produced in the muscles were sometimes more commonly reported in patients taking Zeffix (see below).

tableResults.display_src: Patients with acute heart diseases:
tableResults.ref: Patienten mit akuten Herzerkrankungen:
tableResults.src: Patients with acute heart diseases:

tableResults.display_src: - Blood test results show higher levels of liver enzymes, amylase, lipase or creatine kinase
tableResults.ref: - Erhöhte Konzentrationen an Leberenzymen, Amylase, Lipase oder Kreatinkinase im Rahmen
tableResults.src: - Blood test results show higher levels of liver enzymes, amylase, lipase or creatine kinase

tableResults.display_src: In the absence of such studies, caution should be exercised, as increases in saquinavir levels and/ or increases in liver enzymes may occur.
tableResults.ref: Solange solche Untersuchungen nicht vorliegen, ist Vorsicht angebracht, da erhöhte Saquinavir-Konzentrationen und/oder erhöhte Leberenzym-Werte auftreten könnten.
tableResults.src: In the absence of such studies, caution should be exercised, as increases in saquinavir levels and/ or increases in liver enzymes may occur.

tableResults.display_src: If the cardiac enzyme test results are positive, we may change your medication.
tableResults.ref: Wenn die Ergebnisse des Herzenzymtests positiv sind, können wir Ihre Medikation ändern.
tableResults.src: If the cardiac enzyme test results are positive, we may change your medication.

tableResults.display_src: Patients receiving ACE inhibitors who develop jaundice or marked elevations of hepatic enzymes should discontinue the ACE inhibitor and receive appropriate medical follow-up (see 4.8 Undesirable effects).
tableResults.ref: Patienten, die unter ACE-Hemmertherapie eine Gelbsucht entwickeln oder erhöhte Leberenzymwerte zeigen, müssen den ACE-Hemmer absetzen und einer entsprechenden Nachbehandlung unterzogen werde (4.8 „ Nebenwirkungen“).
tableResults.src: Patients receiving ACE inhibitors who develop jaundice or marked elevations of hepatic enzymes should discontinue the ACE inhibitor and receive appropriate medical follow-up (see 4.8 Undesirable effects).

tableResults.display_src: Liver enzymes should be checked prior to the initiation of therapy with pioglitazone in all patients.
tableResults.ref: Die Leberenzyme sind bei allen Patienten vor Beginn der Therapie mit Pioglitazon zu kontrollieren.
tableResults.src: Liver enzymes should be checked prior to the initiation of therapy with pioglitazone in all patients.

template.translation_hyp: Basierend auf Ihren Symptomen und Testergebnissen handelt es sich weder um einen Herzinfarkt noch um einen Notfall.

baseline.translation_hyp: Ihr Schmerz verbesserte sich durch Beobachtung in der Notaufnahme.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms improved with medication in the ED.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Symptome besserten sich durch Medikamente in der Notaufnahme.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms improved with medication in the ED.

tableResults.display_src: Your back pain improved with Ibuprofen.
tableResults.ref: Mit Ibuprofen besserten sich Ihre Rückenschmerzen.
tableResults.src: Your back pain improved with Ibuprofen.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation did not show evidence of medical conditions requiring emergent intervention at this time, and your pain improved with medication in the ED.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung ergab zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt keine Hinweise auf gesundheitliche Probleme, die ein dringendes Eingreifen erforderten, und Ihre Schmerzen besserten sich durch Medikamente in der Notaufnahme.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation did not show evidence of medical conditions requiring emergent intervention at this time, and your pain improved with medication in the ED.

tableResults.display_src: Your chest pain improved with Nitroglycerin.
tableResults.ref: Mit Nitroglycerin besserten sich Ihre Brustschmerzen.
tableResults.src: Your chest pain improved with Nitroglycerin.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms improved receiving an albuterol breathing treatment.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Symptome verbesserten sich durch eine Albuterol-Atembehandlung.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms improved receiving an albuterol breathing treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Your bleeding was controlled in the ER with pressure.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Blutung wurde in der Notaufnahme mit Druck kontrolliert.
tableResults.src: Your bleeding was controlled in the ER with pressure.

tableResults.display_src: Your injured fingers have been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihre verletzten Finger wurden in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your injured fingers have been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a nerve block procedure.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden durch eine Nervenblockade unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a nerve block procedure.

tableResults.display_src: Your fractured forearm has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr gebrochener Unterarm wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your fractured forearm has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your fractured wrist has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr gebrochenes Handgelenk wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your fractured wrist has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your sprained wrist has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr verstauchtes Handgelenk wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your sprained wrist has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your injured thumb has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr verletzter Daumen wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your injured thumb has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your dislocated shoulder has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihre ausgerenkte Schulter wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your dislocated shoulder has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a nerve block.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit einer Nervenblockade unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a nerve block.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a local anesthetic.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit einem Lokalanästhetikum unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a local anesthetic.

tableResults.display_src: Your headache improved with Acetaminophen.
tableResults.ref: Mit Acetaminophen besserten sich Ihre Kopfschmerzen.
tableResults.src: Your headache improved with Acetaminophen.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms improved with Albuterol and Prednisone.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Symptome besserten sich mit Albuterol und Prednison.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms improved with Albuterol and Prednisone.

tableResults.display_src: Your dislocated elbow has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr ausgerenkter Ellenbogen wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your dislocated elbow has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your broken knee has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr gebrochenes Knie wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your broken knee has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your shortness of breath improved with Albuterol.
tableResults.ref: Mit Albuterol besserte sich Ihre Atemnot.
tableResults.src: Your shortness of breath improved with Albuterol.

tableResults.display_src: The patient’s mental confusion improved, and the patient was discharged with stable vital signs and no concerning symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Die geistige Verwirrung des Patienten verbesserte sich und der Patient wurde mit stabilen Vitalfunktionen und ohne besorgniserregende Symptome entlassen.
tableResults.src: The patient’s mental confusion improved, and the patient was discharged with stable vital signs and no concerning symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: The patient's clinical condition improved, and he was extubated on day 16, with tube feeding of the duodenum starting on day 18.
tableResults.ref: Der klinische Zustand des Patienten verbesserte sich und er wurde am 16. Tag extubiert, wobei am 18. Tag mit der Sondenernährung des Zwölffingerdarms begonnen wurde.
tableResults.src: The patient's clinical condition improved, and he was extubated on day 16, with tube feeding of the duodenum starting on day 18.

tableResults.display_src: The patient's systolic blood pressure stabilized on hospital day 5, and the ejection fraction improved while BNP decreased.
tableResults.ref: Der systolische Blutdruck des Patienten stabilisierte sich am fünften Krankenhaustag und die Ejektionsfraktion verbesserte sich, während der BNP abnahm.
tableResults.src: The patient's systolic blood pressure stabilized on hospital day 5, and the ejection fraction improved while BNP decreased.

tableResults.display_src: These may include monitoring of vital signs and observation of clinical status.
tableResults.ref: Dazu gehören eine Überwachung der Vitalzeichen und des klinischen Status.
tableResults.src: These may include monitoring of vital signs and observation of clinical status.

tableResults.display_src: The patient's symptoms improved significantly with the initiation of treatment.
tableResults.ref: Mit Beginn der Behandlung besserten sich die Symptome des Patienten deutlich.
tableResults.src: The patient's symptoms improved significantly with the initiation of treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with lidocaine patches.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Lidocain-Pflastern unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with lidocaine patches.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with epidural analgesia.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden durch eine epidurale Analgesie unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with epidural analgesia.

tableResults.display_src: However, his symptoms gradually worsened, and he developed disorientation, hypoxemia, and severe stenosis and occlusion from the right common iliac vein to the junction of the right and left iliac veins.
tableResults.ref: Seine Symptome verschlimmerten sich jedoch allmählich und er entwickelte Orientierungslosigkeit, Hypoxämie sowie eine schwere Stenose und einen Verschluss von der rechten gemeinsamen Beckenvene bis zur Verbindung der rechten und linken Beckenvene.
tableResults.src: However, his symptoms gradually worsened, and he developed disorientation, hypoxemia, and severe stenosis and occlusion from the right common iliac vein to the junction of the right and left iliac veins.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with opioid medication.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Opioid-Medikamenten unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with opioid medication.

tableResults.display_src: CT scans also revealed the superior segmental defect in the acetabulum along with loosening of the acetabular cup.
tableResults.ref: CT-Scans zeigten außerdem den oberen Segmentdefekt in der Hüftpfanne sowie eine Lockerung der Hüftpfanne.
tableResults.src: CT scans also revealed the superior segmental defect in the acetabulum along with loosening of the acetabular cup.

tableResults.display_src: 17 I54V/ T, A71V, V82L, I84V as well as a mutation in the gag polyprotein CA/ P2 cleavage site.
tableResults.ref: L10F, I13V, V32I, L33F, M36I, K45I, I54V/T, A71V, V82L, I84V; sowie eine Mutation an der CA/P2 Spaltstelle des gag Polyproteins.
tableResults.src: 17 I54V/ T, A71V, V82L, I84V as well as a mutation in the gag polyprotein CA/ P2 cleavage site.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with gabapentin.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Gabapentin unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with gabapentin.

tableResults.display_src: You were evaluated in the ER for an abscess.
tableResults.ref: Sie wurden in der Notaufnahme auf einen Abszess untersucht.
tableResults.src: You were evaluated in the ER for an abscess.

tableResults.display_src: If the area of inflammation was outlined today in the ER, please return to the ER immediately if the area of redness increases beyond that border.
tableResults.ref: Wenn der Entzündungsbereich heute in der Notaufnahme abgegrenzt wurde, kehren Sie bitte sofort in die Notaufnahme zurück, wenn der Rötungsbereich über diese Grenze hinaus zunimmt.
tableResults.src: If the area of inflammation was outlined today in the ER, please return to the ER immediately if the area of redness increases beyond that border.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with acetaminophen.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Paracetamol unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with acetaminophen.

tableResults.display_src: Your knee has been ace wrapped and you were given crutches in the ER to help your knee heal.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Knie wurde mit einem Verband versorgt und Sie bekamen in der Notaufnahme Krücken, um die Heilung Ihres Knies zu unterstützen.
tableResults.src: Your knee has been ace wrapped and you were given crutches in the ER to help your knee heal.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain is most likely due to a kidney stone which will pass on its own.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen sind höchstwahrscheinlich auf einen Nierenstein zurückzuführen, der von selbst verschwindet.
tableResults.src: Your pain is most likely due to a kidney stone which will pass on its own.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with tramadol.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Tramadol unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with tramadol.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with oral analgesics.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit oralen Analgetika unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with oral analgesics.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit nichtsteroidalen entzündungshemmenden Medikamenten unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.

tableResults.display_src: DepoCyte is to be administered by slow injection over a period of 1-5 minutes directly into the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) via either an intraventricular reservoir or by direct injection into the lumbar sac.
tableResults.ref: DepoCyte ist mittels langsamer Injektion über einen Zeitraum von 1– 5 Minuten direkt in den Liquor cerebrospinalis (CSF) zu verabreichen, entweder über ein intraventrikuläres Reservoir oder durch direkte Injektion in den Lumbalsack.
tableResults.src: DepoCyte is to be administered by slow injection over a period of 1-5 minutes directly into the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) via either an intraventricular reservoir or by direct injection into the lumbar sac.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with topical lidocaine patches.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit topischen Lidocain-Pflastern unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with topical lidocaine patches.

tableResults.display_src: Your broken ankle has been splinted in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihr gebrochener Knöchel wurde in der Notaufnahme geschient.
tableResults.src: Your broken ankle has been splinted in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your burn has been dressed in the ER.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Verbrennung wurde in der Notaufnahme behandelt.
tableResults.src: Your burn has been dressed in the ER.

tableResults.display_src: Your nausea improved with Ondansetron.
tableResults.ref: Mit Ondansetron besserte sich Ihre Übelkeit.
tableResults.src: Your nausea improved with Ondansetron.

tableResults.display_src: Together, these effects reduce the levels of the hormones in the body, improving the symptoms of the disease.
tableResults.ref: Zusammen genommen senken diese Wirkungen die Konzentrationen der Hormone im Körper und lindern dadurch die Symptome der Erkrankung.
tableResults.src: Together, these effects reduce the levels of the hormones in the body, improving the symptoms of the disease.

tableResults.display_src: Treatment with medication was started, and the patient gradually recovered with slight improvement of neurological deficits.
tableResults.ref: Die medikamentöse Behandlung wurde begonnen und der Patient erholte sich allmählich mit einer leichten Verbesserung der neurologischen Defizite.
tableResults.src: Treatment with medication was started, and the patient gradually recovered with slight improvement of neurological deficits.

tableResults.display_src: In general, the effective concentration and the concentration at which toxicity occurs increase with increasing tolerance to opioids.
tableResults.ref: Im Allgemeinen erhöht sich die wirksame Konzentration und die Konzentration, bei der eine Toxizität auftritt, mit zunehmender Gewöhnung gegenüber Opioiden.
tableResults.src: In general, the effective concentration and the concentration at which toxicity occurs increase with increasing tolerance to opioids.

tableResults.display_src: The x-ray of your ankle showed a minor fracture, which will heal with rest and proper care.
tableResults.ref: Das Röntgenbild Ihres Knöchels zeigte einen kleinen Bruch, der bei Ruhe und richtiger Pflege heilen wird.
tableResults.src: The x-ray of your ankle showed a minor fracture, which will heal with rest and proper care.

tableResults.display_src: The x-ray of your foot shows a minor fracture in the metatarsal bone.
tableResults.ref: Das Röntgenbild Ihres Fußes zeigt einen kleinen Bruch im Mittelfußknochen.
tableResults.src: The x-ray of your foot shows a minor fracture in the metatarsal bone.

tableResults.display_src: When sexual stimulation causes the local release of nitric oxide, inhibition of PDE5 by tadalafil produces increased levels of cGMP in the corpus cavernosum.
tableResults.ref: Wenn eine sexuelle Stimulation die lokale Ausschüttung von Stickstoffoxid verursacht, erzeugt Tadalafil durch die Hemmung der PDE5 erhöhte cGMP-Spiegel im Corpus Cavernosum.
tableResults.src: When sexual stimulation causes the local release of nitric oxide, inhibition of PDE5 by tadalafil produces increased levels of cGMP in the corpus cavernosum.

tableResults.display_src: Patients treated with Humira usually experienced improvement in haematological signs of chronic inflammation.
tableResults.ref: Bei mit Humira behandelten Patienten besserte sich im Allgemeinen die mit einer chronischen Entzündung einhergehende Veränderung der Blutwerte.
tableResults.src: Patients treated with Humira usually experienced improvement in haematological signs of chronic inflammation.

tableResults.display_src: - Canalicular wall demonstrated negative and positive pressure changes with saline-induced narrowing and dilatation.
tableResults.ref: - Die Kanalwand zeigte negative und positive Druckveränderungen mit durch Kochsalzlösung verursachter Verengung und Erweiterung.
tableResults.src: - Canalicular wall demonstrated negative and positive pressure changes with saline-induced narrowing and dilatation.

tableResults.display_src: The main measures of effectiveness were the time taken for symptoms to get worse and the number of patients whose symptoms got worse over 24 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Die Hauptindikatoren für die Wirksamkeit waren die Zeit bis zur Verschlimmerung der Symptome und die Anzahl der Patienten, deren Symptome sich im Lauf von 24 Wochen verschlimmerten.
tableResults.src: The main measures of effectiveness were the time taken for symptoms to get worse and the number of patients whose symptoms got worse over 24 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was discharged in a stable condition, and her clinical indications improved satisfactorily.
tableResults.ref: Die Patientin wurde in einem stabilen Zustand entlassen und ihre klinischen Indikationen verbesserten sich zufriedenstellend.
tableResults.src: The patient was discharged in a stable condition, and her clinical indications improved satisfactorily.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms improved with Albuterol and steroids, and your evaluation did not show evidence of medical conditions requiring emergent intervention at this time.
tableResults.ref: Unter Albuterol und Steroiden verbesserten sich Ihre Symptome, und Ihre Untersuchung ergab zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt keine Hinweise auf Erkrankungen, die ein dringendes Eingreifen erforderten.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms improved with Albuterol and steroids, and your evaluation did not show evidence of medical conditions requiring emergent intervention at this time.

tableResults.display_src: The dose, duration of treatment and frequency will depend on the weight and type of animal and condition to be treated.
tableResults.ref: Dosis, Behandlungsdauer und -häufigkeit richten sich nach dem Gewicht und der Art des Tieres sowie der zu behandelnden Erkrankung.
tableResults.src: The dose, duration of treatment and frequency will depend on the weight and type of animal and condition to be treated.

tableResults.display_src: She improved gradually and at 6-month follow-up, she was symptom free.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Zustand verbesserte sich allmählich und nach sechs Monaten war sie beschwerdefrei.
tableResults.src: She improved gradually and at 6-month follow-up, she was symptom free.

tableResults.display_src: In placebo-controlled studies, bosentan-related decreases in haemoglobin concentration were not progressive, and stabilised after the first 4– 12 weeks of treatment.
tableResults.ref: In plazebokontrollierten Studien waren die mit Bosentan in Zusammenhang stehenden erniedrigten Hämoglobinkonzentrationen nicht progredient und stabilisierten sich innerhalb der ersten 4 bis 12 Wochen nach Behandlungsbeginn.
tableResults.src: In placebo-controlled studies, bosentan-related decreases in haemoglobin concentration were not progressive, and stabilised after the first 4– 12 weeks of treatment.

tableResults.display_src: To minimize scarring reduce sun exposure for the next year by wearing sunscreen, hats and long clothing.
tableResults.ref: Um Narbenbildung zu minimieren, reduzieren Sie die Sonneneinstrahlung im nächsten Jahr durch das Tragen von Sonnenschutzmitteln, Hüten und langer Kleidung.
tableResults.src: To minimize scarring reduce sun exposure for the next year by wearing sunscreen, hats and long clothing.

tableResults.display_src: Opioids relieve pain by attaching to ‘ opioid receptors ’ in the brain and spinal cord.
tableResults.ref: Opioide lindern Schmerzen, indem sie sich an die sogenannten „ Opioidrezeptoren“ im Gehirn und Rückenmark binden.
tableResults.src: Opioids relieve pain by attaching to ‘ opioid receptors ’ in the brain and spinal cord.

tableResults.display_src: It limits thrombin formation by inactivating factors Va and VIIIa, thereby providing negative feedback regulation of coagulation.
tableResults.ref: Es begrenzt die Thrombinbildung durch Inaktivierung der Faktoren Va und VIIIa, was zu einer negativen Rückkopplung auf die Blutgerinnung führt.
tableResults.src: It limits thrombin formation by inactivating factors Va and VIIIa, thereby providing negative feedback regulation of coagulation.

tableResults.display_src: Travoprost, a prostaglandin F2α analogue, is a full agonist which is highly selective and has a high affinity for the prostaglandin FP receptor, and reduces the intraocular pressure by increasing the outflow of aqueous humour via trabecular meshwork and uveoscleral pathways.
tableResults.ref: Travoprost, ein Prostaglandin-F2α -Analogon, ist ein hochselektiver Vollagonist mit hoher Affinität zum Prostaglandin-FP-Rezeptor und senkt den intraokulären Druck durch Steigerung des Kammerwasserabflusses durch das Trabekelmaschenwerk und uveosklerale Abflusswege.
tableResults.src: Travoprost, a prostaglandin F2α analogue, is a full agonist which is highly selective and has a high affinity for the prostaglandin FP receptor, and reduces the intraocular pressure by increasing the outflow of aqueous humour via trabecular meshwork and uveoscleral pathways.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a combination of acetaminophen and codeine.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit einer Kombination aus Paracetamol und Codein unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a combination of acetaminophen and codeine.

tableResults.display_src: When given by inhalation as in Sanohex, salbutamol directly activates the beta2-receptors in the respiratory system.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Salbutamol wie bei Sanohex durch Inhalation verabreicht wird, aktiviert es direkt die Beta-2-Rezeptoren in dem Atemsystem.
tableResults.src: When given by inhalation as in Sanohex, salbutamol directly activates the beta2-receptors in the respiratory system.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was treated conservatively with oxygen by nasal cannula and admitted for observation.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient wurde konservativ mit Sauerstoff über eine Nasenkanüle behandelt und zur Beobachtung aufgenommen.
tableResults.src: The patient was treated conservatively with oxygen by nasal cannula and admitted for observation.

tableResults.display_src: The patient showed no further symptoms of seizure or intracranial pathology, as demonstrated by computed tomography of the brain after 72 hours of observation and magnetic resonance imaging of the brain.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient zeigte keine weiteren Anfallssymptome oder intrakraniellen Pathologien, wie durch eine Computertomographie des Gehirns nach 72-stündiger Beobachtung und eine Magnetresonanztomographie des Gehirns nachgewiesen wurde.
tableResults.src: The patient showed no further symptoms of seizure or intracranial pathology, as demonstrated by computed tomography of the brain after 72 hours of observation and magnetic resonance imaging of the brain.

tableResults.display_src: The clinical significance of these observations is unknown.
tableResults.ref: Die klinische Bedeutung dieser Beobachtungen ist nicht bekannt.
tableResults.src: The clinical significance of these observations is unknown.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was lost for follow-up, and further evaluation could not be carried out.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient war für die Nachuntersuchung nicht mehr verfügbar und eine weitere Untersuchung konnte nicht durchgeführt werden.
tableResults.src: The patient was lost for follow-up, and further evaluation could not be carried out.

tableResults.display_src: Regular monitoring of blood counts is recommended (see above).
tableResults.ref: Regelmäßige Blutbildkontrollen werden empfohlen (siehe oben).
tableResults.src: Regular monitoring of blood counts is recommended (see above).

tableResults.display_src: To continue to monitor patient exposure to etoricoxib in GPRD and evaluate potential contribution of observational study(-ies).
tableResults.ref: Fortlaufende Überwachung der Patientenexposition mit Etoricoxib in der GPRD-Datenbank (General Practice Research Database) und Evaluierung des potenziellen Beitrags einer (von) Beobachtungsstudie(n).
tableResults.src: To continue to monitor patient exposure to etoricoxib in GPRD and evaluate potential contribution of observational study(-ies).

tableResults.display_src: Her evaluation, including a vision test and ocular pressure measurement, suggests that her symptoms are due to glaucoma.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich eines Sehtests und einer Augendruckmessung, legt nahe, dass ihre Symptome auf ein Glaukom zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Her evaluation, including a vision test and ocular pressure measurement, suggests that her symptoms are due to glaucoma.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including physical exam and x-rays, were unremarkable// reveal a fracture.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Beurteilung, einschließlich körperlicher Untersuchung und Röntgenaufnahmen, war unauffällig bzw. ergab einen Bruch.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including physical exam and x-rays, were unremarkable// reveal a fracture.

tableResults.display_src: Fundoscopy revealed a whitish retinal lesion with blurred margins in the lower midperiphery.
tableResults.ref: Die Fundoskopie ergab eine weißliche Netzhautläsion mit unscharfen Rändern in der unteren Mittelperipherie.
tableResults.src: Fundoscopy revealed a whitish retinal lesion with blurred margins in the lower midperiphery.

tableResults.display_src: Anaesthetic complications, indicative of the restoration of neuromuscular function, include movement of a limb or the body or coughing during the anaesthetic procedure or during surgery, grimacing, or suckling on the endotracheal tube.
tableResults.ref: Narkosekomplikationen, hinweisend auf ein Wiedereinsetzen der neuromuskulären Funktion, umfassen Bewegung der Gliedmaßen oder des Körpers oder Husten während der Narkose oder während der Operation, Grimassieren oder Saugen am Endotrachealtubus.
tableResults.src: Anaesthetic complications, indicative of the restoration of neuromuscular function, include movement of a limb or the body or coughing during the anaesthetic procedure or during surgery, grimacing, or suckling on the endotracheal tube.

tableResults.display_src: Your ultrasound and labs show that your kidney function has returned to normal.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Ultraschall und Ihre Laborwerte zeigen, dass sich Ihre Nierenfunktion wieder normalisiert hat.
tableResults.src: Your ultrasound and labs show that your kidney function has returned to normal.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you have a pulmonary function test within the next 2 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie innerhalb der nächsten 2 Wochen einen Lungenfunktionstest durchführen lassen.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you have a pulmonary function test within the next 2 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Pulmonology Department within the next 3 weeks.

tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Pulmonology Department within the next 3 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Nephrology Clinic within the next 12 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb der nächsten 12 Tage die Klinik für Nephrologie.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Nephrology Clinic within the next 12 days.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor at your next scheduled appointment.

tableResults.src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor at your next scheduled appointment.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your primary care physician in 7-10 days for suture removal.
tableResults.ref: Bitte wenden Sie sich zur Nahtentfernung innerhalb von 7–10 Tagen an Ihren Hausarzt.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with your primary care physician in 7-10 days for suture removal.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you have a medication review within the next 2 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie innerhalb der nächsten 2 Wochen eine Medikamentenüberprüfung durchführen lassen.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you have a medication review within the next 2 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your primary care physician as needed.
tableResults.ref: Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Bedarf an Ihren Hausarzt.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with your primary care physician as needed.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with an orthopedic surgeon in 1 week.
tableResults.ref: Bitte konsultieren Sie innerhalb einer Woche einen Orthopäden.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with an orthopedic surgeon in 1 week.

tableResults.ref: Bitte konsultieren Sie innerhalb einer Woche einen Orthopäden.
tableResults.src: Please follow-up with an orthopedic surgeon in 1 week.

tableResults.display_src: Please share this information with your primary care doctor.

tableResults.src: Please share this information with your primary care doctor.

tableResults.display_src: Method of administration 2 TRISENOX must be administered intravenously over 1-2 hours.
tableResults.ref: TRISENOX ist intravenös über einen Zeitraum von 1-2 Stunden zu infundieren.
tableResults.src: Method of administration 2 TRISENOX must be administered intravenously over 1-2 hours.

tableResults.display_src: If the patient has forgotten to take a tablet, the tablet should be taken as soon as possible within the next twelve hours.
tableResults.ref: Wurde von der Patientin die Einnahme einer Filmtablette vergessen, muss diese so bald wie möglich innerhalb der nächsten 12 Stunden eingenommen werden.
tableResults.src: If the patient has forgotten to take a tablet, the tablet should be taken as soon as possible within the next twelve hours.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you have a blood sugar test within the next 3 days.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie innerhalb der nächsten 3 Tage einen Blutzuckertest durchführen lassen.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you have a blood sugar test within the next 3 days.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Diabetes Center within the next 10 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb der nächsten 10 Tage das Diabeteszentrum.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Diabetes Center within the next 10 days.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Wound Care Clinic within the next 5 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb der nächsten 5 Tage die Wundversorgungsklinik.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Wound Care Clinic within the next 5 days.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with an orthopedic surgeon in about 1 week.
tableResults.ref: Bitte konsultieren Sie in etwa einer Woche einen Orthopäden.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with an orthopedic surgeon in about 1 week.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Gastroenterology Department within the next 21 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb der nächsten 21 Tage die Abteilung für Gastroenterologie.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Gastroenterology Department within the next 21 days.

tableResults.display_src: The dose is repeated every 4 weeks for as long as the disease does not progress and you are able to tolerate the treatment.
tableResults.ref: Die Dosis wird alle 4 Wochen wiederholt werden und zwar solange, wie die Erkrankung nicht fortschreitet und Sie die Behandlung vertragen.
tableResults.src: The dose is repeated every 4 weeks for as long as the disease does not progress and you are able to tolerate the treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with a Head and Neck doctor in about 1 week.
tableResults.ref: Bitte konsultieren Sie etwa eine Woche später einen Hals-Nasen-Ohrenarzt.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with a Head and Neck doctor in about 1 week.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Endocrinology Clinic to discuss your medications.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie die Klinik für Endokrinologie, um Ihre Medikamente zu besprechen.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Endocrinology Clinic to discuss your medications.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Cardiology Clinic to discuss your medications.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie die Klinik für Kardiologie, um Ihre Medikamente zu besprechen.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Cardiology Clinic to discuss your medications.

tableResults.display_src: Improvement in muscle tone occurred within two weeks with the peak effect generally seen within four to six weeks.
tableResults.ref: Eine Besserung des Muskeltonus trat innerhalb der ersten zwei Wochen ein, wobei sich die Spitzenwirkung im Allgemeinen innerhalb von vier bis sechs Wochen zeigte.
tableResults.src: Improvement in muscle tone occurred within two weeks with the peak effect generally seen within four to six weeks.

tableResults.display_src: The medicine’ s effects were maintained for up to 52 weeks in two of the studies.
tableResults.ref: Die Wirkungen des Arzneimittels wurden in zwei der Studien über bis zu 52 Wochen aufrechterhalten.
tableResults.src: The medicine’ s effects were maintained for up to 52 weeks in two of the studies.

tableResults.display_src: The doctor should check the response every four to six weeks and adjust the dose if needed.
tableResults.ref: Der Arzt sollte das Ansprechen auf die Behandlung alle vier bis sechs Wochen überprüfen und, falls erforderlich, die Dosis anpassen.
tableResults.src: The doctor should check the response every four to six weeks and adjust the dose if needed.

tableResults.display_src: You will be given Paxene every three weeks, as long as the results of your blood tests show that it is safe to carry on with your treatment.
tableResults.ref: Sie erhalten Paxene alle 3 Wochen, so lange wie die Ergebnisse Ihrer Blutuntersuchungen zeigen, dass die Behandlung weitergeführt werden kann.
tableResults.src: You will be given Paxene every three weeks, as long as the results of your blood tests show that it is safe to carry on with your treatment.

tableResults.display_src: After the starting dose, you will receive the next dose 4 weeks later, and then every 12 weeks • Patients who weigh more than 100 kg may be given 90 mg instead of 45 mg.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Anfangsdosis werden Sie die nächste Dosis 4 Wochen später erhalten und dann alle 12 Wochen • Patienten, die mehr als 100 kg wiegen, kann 90 mg statt 45 mg gegeben werden.
tableResults.src: After the starting dose, you will receive the next dose 4 weeks later, and then every 12 weeks • Patients who weigh more than 100 kg may be given 90 mg instead of 45 mg.

tableResults.display_src: Parareg should be titrated every 2 to 4 weeks to a maximum dose of 180 mg once daily to achieve a target parathyroid hormone (PTH) in dialysis patients of between 150-300 pg/ ml (15.9-31.8 pmol/ l) in the intact PTH (iPTH) assay.
tableResults.ref: 13 als intaktes PTH (iPTH), zu erreichen, sollte die Dosis von Parareg alle 2-4 Wochen bis zu einer Maximaldosis von 180 mg einmal täglich erhöht werden.
tableResults.src: Parareg should be titrated every 2 to 4 weeks to a maximum dose of 180 mg once daily to achieve a target parathyroid hormone (PTH) in dialysis patients of between 150-300 pg/ ml (15.9-31.8 pmol/ l) in the intact PTH (iPTH) assay.

tableResults.display_src: The results of the sleep study will come back in about 1 to 2 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Die Ergebnisse der Schlafstudie werden in etwa 1 bis 2 Wochen vorliegen.
tableResults.src: The results of the sleep study will come back in about 1 to 2 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: DepoCyte is to be administered by slow injection over a period of 1-5 minutes directly into the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) via either an intraventricular reservoir or by direct injection into the lumbar sac.
tableResults.ref: DepoCyte ist mittels langsamer Injektion über einen Zeitraum von 1– 5 Minuten direkt in den Liquor cerebrospinalis (CSF) zu verabreichen, entweder über ein intraventrikuläres Reservoir oder durch direkte Injektion in den Lumbalsack.
tableResults.src: DepoCyte is to be administered by slow injection over a period of 1-5 minutes directly into the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) via either an intraventricular reservoir or by direct injection into the lumbar sac.

tableResults.display_src: These acute phenomena may be avoided by using a 1-hour infusion time.
tableResults.ref: Diese akuten Phänomene können durch Anwendung einer Infusionszeit von einer Stunde vermieden werden.
tableResults.src: These acute phenomena may be avoided by using a 1-hour infusion time.

tableResults.display_src: If your nose appears to be deformed in 1-2 weeks, you can find a plastic surgeon by calling (818) 364-3129 or you can call (818) 364-3538 to schedule an appointment with an ENT (Ears, Nose, and Throat) doctor.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Ihre Nase in ein bis zwei Wochen deformiert zu sein scheint, können Sie unter der Rufnummer (818) 364-3129 einen plastischen Chirurgen aufsuchen oder unter der Rufnummer (818) 364-3538 einen Termin mit einem HNO-Arzt (Ohren, Nase und Ohren) vereinbaren Hals) Arzt.
tableResults.src: If your nose appears to be deformed in 1-2 weeks, you can find a plastic surgeon by calling (818) 364-3129 or you can call (818) 364-3538 to schedule an appointment with an ENT (Ears, Nose, and Throat) doctor.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your OB/Gyn within 2 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb von 2 Tagen Ihren Gynäkologen.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with your OB/Gyn within 2 days.

tableResults.display_src: These reactions usually disappear within 1-2 days without treatment.
tableResults.ref: Diese Nebenwirkungen klingen gewöhnlich innerhalb von 1-2 Tagen nach der Impfung ohne Behandlung ab.
tableResults.src: These reactions usually disappear within 1-2 days without treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Continue taking Warfarin 2.5 milligrams once daily in the afternoon for the next 12 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie in den nächsten 12 Wochen weiterhin 2,5 Milligramm Warfarin einmal täglich nachmittags ein.
tableResults.src: Continue taking Warfarin 2.5 milligrams once daily in the afternoon for the next 12 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: As Aerinaze contains pseudoephedrine, it is also contraindicated in patients who are receiving monoamine oxidase (MAO) inhibitor therapy or during the 2 weeks following the stopping of such treatment.
tableResults.ref: Da Aerinaze Pseudoephedrin enthält, ist das Arzneimittel ebenfalls kontraindiziert bei Patienten, die mit einem Monoaminoxidase (MAO)-Hemmer behandelt werden bzw. innerhalb der 2 Wochen nach Beendigung einer solchen Therapie.
tableResults.src: As Aerinaze contains pseudoephedrine, it is also contraindicated in patients who are receiving monoamine oxidase (MAO) inhibitor therapy or during the 2 weeks following the stopping of such treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Endocrinology Clinic if your symptoms persist.
tableResults.ref: Sollten Ihre Symptome weiterhin bestehen, wenden Sie sich bitte an die Endokrinologie-Klinik.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Endocrinology Clinic if your symptoms persist.

templates.translation: Bitte wenden Sie sich an einen Arzt, wenn dies bei Ihnen der Fall ist<SYMPTOM> oder alle neuen oder sich verschlimmernden Symptome, die besorgniserregend sind.

tableResults.display_src: After repetitive yearly injections the safety profile of INTANZA is similar to the previous injections.

tableResults.display_src: Men who have been given Zevalin and who could become fathers must use reliable contraception during and for a year after stopping treatment.

tableResults.src: Men who have been given Zevalin and who could become fathers must use reliable contraception during and for a year after stopping treatment.

tableResults.display_src: th Advasure can cause a swelling at the injection site, particularly in very young piglets, which usually disappears after one week.

templates.template: Please return to the emergency department if you experience <SYMPTOM> or any new or worsening symptoms that are concerning.
templates.translation: Bitte kehren Sie in die Notaufnahme zurück, wenn Sie etwas bemerken<SYMPTOM> oder alle neuen oder sich verschlimmernden Symptome, die besorgniserregend sind.

template.translation_hyp: Bitte besprechen Sie Ihren Besuch in der Notaufnahme heute.

baseline.translation_hyp: Sie sollten Ihren Hauptarzt fragen, ob Sie einen Herzstresstest zur Beurteilung Ihrer Herzfunktion erhalten sollten.

tableResults.display_src: The stress test did NOT show any concerning issues with your heart function during physical activity.
tableResults.ref: Der Stresstest ergab KEINE besorgniserregenden Probleme mit Ihrer Herzfunktion bei körperlicher Aktivität.
tableResults.src: The stress test did NOT show any concerning issues with your heart function during physical activity.

tableResults.display_src: We did a pulmonary function test to assess your lung capacity.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Lungenfunktionstest durchgeführt, um Ihre Lungenkapazität zu beurteilen.
tableResults.src: We did a pulmonary function test to assess your lung capacity.

tableResults.display_src: We did a blood glucose test to monitor your sugar levels.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Blutzuckertest durchgeführt, um Ihren Zuckerspiegel zu überwachen.
tableResults.src: We did a blood glucose test to monitor your sugar levels.

tableResults.display_src: We did a thyroid function test to evaluate your thyroid hormones.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Schilddrüsenfunktionstest durchgeführt, um Ihre Schilddrüsenhormone zu bestimmen.
tableResults.src: We did a thyroid function test to evaluate your thyroid hormones.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you establish primary care with a physician if you have not already done so to gain an optimal regimen for your medical conditions.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie die Grundversorgung mit einem Arzt vereinbaren, sofern Sie dies noch nicht getan haben, um eine optimale Behandlung für Ihre Erkrankungen zu erhalten.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you establish primary care with a physician if you have not already done so to gain an optimal regimen for your medical conditions.

tableResults.display_src: Sonata should not be taken at these times because there are not enough clinical data available to assess its safety during pregnancy.
tableResults.ref: Sonata sollte unter diesen Umständen nicht angewendet werden, da keine ausreichenden klinischen Daten vorliegen, um die Sicherheit während der Schwangerschaft zu beurteilen.
tableResults.src: Sonata should not be taken at these times because there are not enough clinical data available to assess its safety during pregnancy.

tableResults.display_src: The stress test showed reduced blood flow to your heart.
tableResults.ref: Der Stresstest ergab eine verminderte Durchblutung Ihres Herzens.
tableResults.src: The stress test showed reduced blood flow to your heart.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that you should continue using your inhaler as directed to manage your asthma symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Bewertung legt nahe, dass Sie Ihren Inhalator weiterhin wie angegeben verwenden sollten, um Ihre Asthmasymptome zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that you should continue using your inhaler as directed to manage your asthma symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: Patients should be advised that if they experience symptoms such as severe depression, psychosis or suicidal ideation, they should contact their doctor immediately to assess the possibility that the symptoms may be related to the use of efavirenz, and if so, to determine whether the risks of continued therapy outweigh the benefits (see section 4.8).
tableResults.ref: Patienten müssen darauf hingewiesen werden, dass sie beim Auftreten von Symptomen wie schwerer Depression, 90 Psychose oder Selbstmordgedanken sofort Ihren Arzt/Ärztin kontaktieren sollten, um die Möglichkeit zu prüfen, ob diese Symptome auf die Anwendung von Efavirenz zurückzuführen sind, und wenn ja, ob die Risiken der Fortsetzung der Therapie den Nutzen überwiegen (siehe Abschnitt 4.8).
tableResults.src: Patients should be advised that if they experience symptoms such as severe depression, psychosis or suicidal ideation, they should contact their doctor immediately to assess the possibility that the symptoms may be related to the use of efavirenz, and if so, to determine whether the risks of continued therapy outweigh the benefits (see section 4.8).

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you schedule a follow-up appointment in one month to monitor your progress.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, einen Folgetermin in einem Monat zu vereinbaren, um Ihre Fortschritte zu überwachen.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you schedule a follow-up appointment in one month to monitor your progress.

tableResults.display_src: Mimpara is used in patients with serious kidney disease who need dialysis to clear their blood of waste products.
tableResults.ref: Mimpara wird bei Patienten mit schwerer Niereninsuffizienz angewendet, die sich einer Dialyse unterziehen müssen, um ihr Blut von Abfallstoffen zu reinigen.
tableResults.src: Mimpara is used in patients with serious kidney disease who need dialysis to clear their blood of waste products.

tableResults.display_src: If you are breast-feeding, the doctor will decide whether Angiox should be used.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Sie stillen, wird Ihr Arzt entscheiden, ob Angiox angewendet werden soll.
tableResults.src: If you are breast-feeding, the doctor will decide whether Angiox should be used.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor will decide if the medicine may be used during pregnancy and breast-feeding.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt wird entscheiden, ob das Arzneimittel während der Schwangerschaft und Stillzeit angewendet werden kann.
tableResults.src: Your doctor will decide if the medicine may be used during pregnancy and breast-feeding.

tableResults.display_src: There is no sufficient therapeutic experience with losartan in patients with heart failure and concomitant severe renal impairment, in patients with severe heart failure (NYHA class IV) as well as in patients with heart failure and symptomatic life threatening cardiac arrhythmias.
tableResults.ref: Es gibt keine ausreichenden therapeutischen Erfahrungen mit Losartan bei Patienten mit Herzinsuffizienz und begleitender schwerer Nierenfunktionsstörung, bei Patienten mit schwerer Herzinsuffizienz (NYHA- Klasse IV), sowie bei Patienten mit Herzinsuffizienz und symptomatischen oder lebensbedrohlichen Herzrhythmusstörungen.
tableResults.src: There is no sufficient therapeutic experience with losartan in patients with heart failure and concomitant severe renal impairment, in patients with severe heart failure (NYHA class IV) as well as in patients with heart failure and symptomatic life threatening cardiac arrhythmias.

tableResults.display_src: If you are breast-feeding, please inform your doctor immediately; he/she will decide if you should take Vimpat.
tableResults.ref: Informieren Sie sofort Ihren Arzt, wenn Sie stillen; er wird dann entscheiden, ob Sie Vimpat erhalten sollten.
tableResults.src: If you are breast-feeding, please inform your doctor immediately; he/she will decide if you should take Vimpat.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor will check whether any symptoms you had may be related to this hypersensitivity reaction.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt wird abklären, ob irgendwelche Symptome mit einer Überempfindlichkeitsreaktion in Zusammenhang stehen.
tableResults.src: Your doctor will check whether any symptoms you had may be related to this hypersensitivity reaction.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor will decide if you should receive CELVAPAN.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt wird dann entscheiden, ob CELVAPAN bei Ihnen angewendet wird.
tableResults.src: Your doctor will decide if you should receive CELVAPAN.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Pulmonary Clinic to monitor your shortness of breath and lung function.
tableResults.ref: Bitte wenden Sie sich an die Lungenklinik, um Ihre Atemnot und Lungenfunktion zu überwachen.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Pulmonary Clinic to monitor your shortness of breath and lung function.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor will decide if you belong to a specific group of patients for which pre-treatment with corticosteroids is to be considered (for example, patients with intracerebral or spinal cord metastases).
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt entscheidet, ob Sie einer bestimmten Patientengruppe angehören, für die eine Vorbehandlung mit Kortikosteroiden in Betracht gezogen werden sollte (beispielsweise Patienten mit Metastasen in Hirn oder Rückenmark).
tableResults.src: Your doctor will decide if you belong to a specific group of patients for which pre-treatment with corticosteroids is to be considered (for example, patients with intracerebral or spinal cord metastases).

tableResults.display_src: The patient is advised to follow up with their primary care physician to manage their COPD, IHD, hypertension, and rib fractures.
tableResults.ref: Dem Patienten wird empfohlen, sich an seinen Hausarzt zu wenden, um seine COPD, IHD, Bluthochdruck und Rippenfrakturen zu behandeln.
tableResults.src: The patient is advised to follow up with their primary care physician to manage their COPD, IHD, hypertension, and rib fractures.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was discharged from the hospital after 10 days with a normal heart function.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient wurde nach 10 Tagen mit normaler Herzfunktion aus dem Krankenhaus entlassen.
tableResults.src: The patient was discharged from the hospital after 10 days with a normal heart function.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that you need to monitor your blood sugar levels regularly if you are diabetic.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Auswertung legt nahe, dass Sie Ihren Blutzuckerspiegel regelmäßig überwachen müssen, wenn Sie Diabetiker sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that you need to monitor your blood sugar levels regularly if you are diabetic.

tableResults.display_src: In a 3-month study of 302 patients with mild stable heart failure, all of whom were receiving standard therapy for stable heart failure, addition of aliskiren 150 mg was well tolerated.
tableResults.ref: In einer 3-Monatsstudie an 302 Patienten mit leichter, stabiler Herzinsuffizienz, die alle eine Standardtherapie zur Behandlung der stabilen Herzinsuffizienz erhielten, wurde die zusätzliche Gabe von 150 mg Aliskiren gut vertragen.
tableResults.src: In a 3-month study of 302 patients with mild stable heart failure, all of whom were receiving standard therapy for stable heart failure, addition of aliskiren 150 mg was well tolerated.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor will decide with you whether Hycamtin therapy is better than further treatment with your initial chemotherapy.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt wird mit Ihnen gemeinsam entscheiden, ob eine Behandlung mit Hycamtin besser ist als eine erneute Behandlung mit dem anfänglich benutzten Chemotherapieschema.
tableResults.src: Your doctor will decide with you whether Hycamtin therapy is better than further treatment with your initial chemotherapy.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was informed that she would need a cardiac catheterization, however, she refused due to concerns about maintaining her ability to breastfeed her infant child.
tableResults.ref: Der Patientin wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie eine Herzkatheteruntersuchung benötige, sie lehnte dies jedoch ab, da sie Bedenken hinsichtlich der Aufrechterhaltung ihrer Fähigkeit zum Stillen ihres Säuglings hatte.
tableResults.src: The patient was informed that she would need a cardiac catheterization, however, she refused due to concerns about maintaining her ability to breastfeed her infant child.

tableResults.display_src: If you do not have a Pediatrician, you can walk into the pediatric clinic on the scheduled clinic days to establish a doctor for you child.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Sie keinen Kinderarzt haben, können Sie an den vorgesehenen Kliniktagen in die Kinderklinik gehen, um einen Arzt für Ihr Kind zu finden.
tableResults.src: If you do not have a Pediatrician, you can walk into the pediatric clinic on the scheduled clinic days to establish a doctor for you child.

tableResults.display_src: It is not emergent at this time but it is recommended that you make an appointment at a surgery clinic to be evaluated to have your gallbladder removed.
tableResults.ref: Dies ist zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt noch nicht dringend, es wird jedoch empfohlen, dass Sie einen Termin in einer chirurgischen Klinik vereinbaren, um die Entfernung Ihrer Gallenblase untersuchen zu lassen.
tableResults.src: It is not emergent at this time but it is recommended that you make an appointment at a surgery clinic to be evaluated to have your gallbladder removed.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed that your heart function has returned to normal.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat ergeben, dass sich Ihre Herzfunktion wieder normalisiert hat.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed that your heart function has returned to normal.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you establish primary care with a physician if you have not already done so to gain an optimal regimen for pain control.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie die Grundversorgung mit einem Arzt vereinbaren, sofern Sie dies noch nicht getan haben, um ein optimales Schema zur Schmerzkontrolle zu erhalten.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you establish primary care with a physician if you have not already done so to gain an optimal regimen for pain control.

tableResults.display_src: It is very important that you have a pulmonary function test within the next 2 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass Sie innerhalb der nächsten 2 Wochen einen Lungenfunktionstest durchführen lassen.
tableResults.src: It is very important that you have a pulmonary function test within the next 2 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor should decide whether you can take YENTREVE with other medicines.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt sollte entscheiden, ob Sie YENTREVE zusammen mit anderen Arzneimitteln einnehmen dürfen.
tableResults.src: Your doctor should decide whether you can take YENTREVE with other medicines.

tableResults.display_src: A number of trials were carried out in both the laboratory and in the field in order to assess the efficacy of the product.
tableResults.ref: Um die Wirksamkeit des Produkts beurteilen zu können, wurde eine Reihe von Labor- und Feldversuchen durchgeführt.
tableResults.src: A number of trials were carried out in both the laboratory and in the field in order to assess the efficacy of the product.

tableResults.display_src: It is recommended that animals are treated in the early stages of the disease and that their response is evaluated within 48 hours.
tableResults.ref: Es wird empfohlen, die Tiere im Frühstadium der Erkrankung zu behandeln und den Behandlungserfolg nach 48 Stunden zu überprüfen.
tableResults.src: It is recommended that animals are treated in the early stages of the disease and that their response is evaluated within 48 hours.

tableResults.display_src: In addition, tell your doctor if your child experienced any symptoms that suggest an allergic reaction after any dose in the vaccination series.
tableResults.ref: Darüber hinaus sollten Sie Ihren Arzt darüber informieren, wenn Ihr Kind nach einer der Dosen der Impfserie Symptome hatte, die auf eine allergische Reaktion hindeuten.
tableResults.src: In addition, tell your doctor if your child experienced any symptoms that suggest an allergic reaction after any dose in the vaccination series.

tableResults.display_src: In particular, you should tell your doctor if you are taking or have recently taken medicines with active substances like:
tableResults.ref: Insbesondere müssen Sie Ihren Arzt verständigen, wenn Sie Arzneimittel mit folgenden Wirkstoffen einnehmen bzw. vor kurzem eingenommen haben:
tableResults.src: In particular, you should tell your doctor if you are taking or have recently taken medicines with active substances like:

tableResults.display_src: We did a blood pressure test to monitor for hypertension.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Blutdrucktest durchgeführt, um auf Bluthochdruck zu achten.
tableResults.src: We did a blood pressure test to monitor for hypertension.

tableResults.display_src: You will not need to test your sugar levels on a day-by-day basis to set the dose of BYETTA.
tableResults.ref: Sie brauchen nicht täglich Ihren Blutzuckerspiegel zu messen, um die BYETTA-Dosis zu bestimmen.
tableResults.src: You will not need to test your sugar levels on a day-by-day basis to set the dose of BYETTA.

tableResults.display_src: The active comparator groups were included to check that the study was able to measure the effectiveness of medicines in treating depression.
tableResults.ref: Die mit einem aktiven Komparator behandelten Gruppen wurden in die Studie einbezogen um sicherzustellen, dass die Studie in der Lage war, die Wirksamkeit von Arzneimitteln zur Behandlung der Depression zu messen.
tableResults.src: The active comparator groups were included to check that the study was able to measure the effectiveness of medicines in treating depression.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including various heart tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to congestive heart failure.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich verschiedener Herztests, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf eine Herzinsuffizienz zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including various heart tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to congestive heart failure.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor at your next scheduled appointment.
tableResults.ref: Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Ihrem nächsten Termin an Ihren Hausarzt.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor at your next scheduled appointment.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor in 2-3 days.
tableResults.ref: Bitte kontaktieren Sie innerhalb von 2-3 Tagen Ihren Hausarzt.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with your primary care doctor in 2-3 days.

tableResults.display_src: Please share this information with your primary care doctor.
tableResults.ref: Bitte teilen Sie diese Informationen Ihrem Hausarzt mit.
tableResults.src: Please share this information with your primary care doctor.

tableResults.display_src: There have been 2 clinical studies to evaluate the use of Ceplene in the maintenance of remission in adult AML patients.
tableResults.ref: Es wurden 2 klinische Studien durchgeführt, um die Anwendung von Ceplene für die Aufrechterhaltung der Remission bei erwachsenen AML-Patienten zu bewerten.
tableResults.src: There have been 2 clinical studies to evaluate the use of Ceplene in the maintenance of remission in adult AML patients.

tableResults.display_src: Please arrange to see a general surgeon for elective surgery through your primary care doctor.
tableResults.ref: Bitte vereinbaren Sie mit Ihrem Hausarzt einen Termin bei einem Allgemeinchirurgen für eine geplante Operation.
tableResults.src: Please arrange to see a general surgeon for elective surgery through your primary care doctor.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was advised to schedule follow-up visits with their primary care physician to monitor the status of OP and manage their hypothyroidism.

tableResults.src: Please contact a healthcare provider if you experience confusion or altered mental status or any new or worsening symptoms that are concerning.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed that your medication regimen is effective in managing your pain and you should continue with the prescribed dosage.

tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed that your medication regimen is effective in managing your pain and you should continue with the prescribed dosage.

tableResults.display_src: Please call 911 if you experience severe abdominal pain, especially if it is accompanied by vomiting, diarrhea, or signs of dehydration.

tableResults.src: Please call 911 if you experience severe abdominal pain, especially if it is accompanied by vomiting, diarrhea, or signs of dehydration.

tableResults.src: Four days after your injection, your doctor will treat your cancer with laser light.

tableResults.display_src: If this is the case, your doctor will tell you how to switch from that treatment to Rasilez HCT.

tableResults.src: If this is the case, your doctor will tell you how to switch from that treatment to Rasilez HCT.

tableResults.display_src: Your treatment should be supervised by a doctor who has expertise in thyroid cancer.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests you should take your prescribed medications exactly as directed by your doctor.

tableResults.src: Please rest, ice, and elevate your ankle to control pain and inflammation.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that you do not need any emergent surgery to repair your hernia today.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Bewertung lässt darauf schließen, dass Sie heute keine dringende Operation benötigen, um Ihren Leistenbruch zu reparieren.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that you do not need any emergent surgery to repair your hernia today.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that your wound requires daily cleaning and dressing to prevent infection.
