tableResults.src: Computed tomography to head and chest revealed bilateral lower lung lobe infiltrates and pulmonary edema.

tableResults.display_src: Return to the ER immediately for worsening or uncontrolled pain, difficulty swallowing, eating or breathing, pain on moving your jaw, tongue swelling, fevers 100.4°F or greater, or for any other concerning symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Kehren Sie sofort in die Notaufnahme zurück, wenn sich die Schmerzen verschlimmern oder unkontrolliert auftreten, Sie Schwierigkeiten beim Schlucken, Essen oder Atmen haben, Schmerzen beim Bewegen des Kiefers auftreten, die Zunge anschwillt, Fieber über 45 °C oder mehr auftritt oder wenn andere besorgniserregende Symptome auftreten.
tableResults.src: Return to the ER immediately for worsening or uncontrolled pain, difficulty swallowing, eating or breathing, pain on moving your jaw, tongue swelling, fevers 100.4°F or greater, or for any other concerning symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: As with all insulins, subcutaneous injection in the abdominal wall ensures a faster absorption than other injection sites.
tableResults.ref: Wie bei allen Insulinen führt die subkutane Injektion in das Unterhautfettgewebe des Bauches im Vergleich zu anderen Injektionsstellen zu einer schnelleren Resorption.
tableResults.src: As with all insulins, subcutaneous injection in the abdominal wall ensures a faster absorption than other injection sites.

tableResults.display_src: The CT scan did NOT show any evidence of a brain tumor.
tableResults.ref: Der CT-Scan ergab KEINE Hinweise auf einen Gehirntumor.
tableResults.src: The CT scan did NOT show any evidence of a brain tumor.

tableResults.display_src: There is no need for follow-up CT scans at this time.
tableResults.ref: Derzeit sind keine weiteren CT-Scans erforderlich.
tableResults.src: There is no need for follow-up CT scans at this time.

tableResults.display_src: CT scan on follow-up visit showed a patent arterial reconstruction.
tableResults.ref: Der CT-Scan bei der Nachuntersuchung zeigte eine offene Arterienrekonstruktion.
tableResults.src: CT scan on follow-up visit showed a patent arterial reconstruction.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including labs and a CT of your brain, were unremarkable.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich Laboruntersuchungen und einer CT Ihres Gehirns, war unauffällig.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including labs and a CT of your brain, were unremarkable.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including lung function tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich Lungenfunktionstests, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf eine chronisch obstruktive Lungenerkrankung (COPD) zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including lung function tests, suggests that your symptoms are due to chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including an ultrasound, showed evidence of a blood clot in your leg.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich einer Ultraschalluntersuchung, ergab Hinweise auf ein Blutgerinnsel in Ihrem Bein.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including an ultrasound, showed evidence of a blood clot in your leg.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation, including a bone density scan, suggests that your symptoms are due to osteoporosis.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich einer Knochendichtemessung, legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf Osteoporose zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation, including a bone density scan, suggests that your symptoms are due to osteoporosis.

tableResults.display_src: Regular blood tests are needed to find the correct daily dose.
tableResults.ref: Mit Hilfe regelmäßiger Blutuntersuchungen wird die jeweils angemessene Tagesdosis ermittelt.
tableResults.src: Regular blood tests are needed to find the correct daily dose.

tableResults.display_src: Your physical exam and blood test results reveal a stable blood sugar level, indicating good management of your diabetes.
tableResults.ref: Ihre körperliche Untersuchung und die Ergebnisse Ihrer Blutuntersuchung zeigen einen stabilen Blutzuckerspiegel, was auf eine gute Behandlung Ihres Diabetes hinweist.
tableResults.src: Your physical exam and blood test results reveal a stable blood sugar level, indicating good management of your diabetes.

tableResults.display_src: Some patients have had blood tests or symptoms indicating that their hepatitis has got worse after stopping Emtriva.

tableResults.src: Some patients have had blood tests or symptoms indicating that their hepatitis has got worse after stopping Emtriva.

tableResults.display_src: Triglyceride and cholesterol testing should be performed prior to initiating tipranavir therapy and during therapy.

tableResults.src: Triglyceride and cholesterol testing should be performed prior to initiating tipranavir therapy and during therapy.

tableResults.display_src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience worsening problems urinating, back pain, blood in your urine, fevers, recurrent vomiting, or any other concerning symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Kehren Sie zur Notaufnahme zurück, wenn bei Ihnen schlimmer werdende Probleme beim Wasserlassen, Rückenschmerzen, Blut im Urin, Fieber, wiederkehrendes Erbrechen oder andere besorgniserregende Symptome auftreten.
tableResults.src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience worsening problems urinating, back pain, blood in your urine, fevers, recurrent vomiting, or any other concerning symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: Please use the strainer as directed to strain your urine until your stone passes.

tableResults.src: Please use the strainer as directed to strain your urine until your stone passes.

tableResults.display_src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience worsening pain, fever, painful urination, blood in urine, weakness, chest pain, difficulty breathing or any other concerning symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Kehren Sie zur Notaufnahme zurück, wenn bei Ihnen schlimmer werdende Schmerzen, Fieber, Schmerzen beim Wasserlassen, Blut im Urin, Schwäche, Brustschmerzen, Atembeschwerden oder andere besorgniserregende Symptome auftreten.
tableResults.src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience worsening pain, fever, painful urination, blood in urine, weakness, chest pain, difficulty breathing or any other concerning symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: At 12 hours, 35.3 ± 13.6% of the administered activity had been excreted into the urine.
tableResults.ref: Nach 12 Stunden waren 35,3 ± 13,6% der verabreichten Aktivität mit dem Urin ausgeschieden.
tableResults.src: At 12 hours, 35.3 ± 13.6% of the administered activity had been excreted into the urine.

tableResults.display_src: The antimicrobial activity of fluoroquinolones in urine is reduced depending on pH and various solubles, mainly cations.
tableResults.ref: Die antimikrobielle Wirksamkeit von Fluorochinolonen im Urin ist abhängig vom pH-Wert und verschiedenen löslichen Stoffen, vor allem Kationen, vermindert.
tableResults.src: The antimicrobial activity of fluoroquinolones in urine is reduced depending on pH and various solubles, mainly cations.

tableResults.display_src: Return to the Emergency Department for inability to control your pain, recurrent vomiting, persistent fevers, blood in your stools, blood in your urine, weakness, or any other worsening symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Gehen Sie zur Notaufnahme, wenn Sie Ihre Schmerzen nicht unter Kontrolle haben, wiederkehrendes Erbrechen, anhaltendes Fieber, Blut im Stuhl, Blut im Urin, Schwäche oder andere sich verschlimmernde Symptome haben.
tableResults.src: Return to the Emergency Department for inability to control your pain, recurrent vomiting, persistent fevers, blood in your stools, blood in your urine, weakness, or any other worsening symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: Your urine suggests that you have a urinary tract infection.

tableResults.display_src: Your urine suggests that you have a kidney infection (pyelonephritis).

tableResults.src: Your urine suggests that you have a kidney infection (pyelonephritis).

tableResults.src: All ADRs reported in the intrathecal clinical trials with ziconotide (short- and long-term exposure) are listed below in order of frequency.

tableResults.src: SOB 002 To evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy data from Naglazyme treatment a Clinical Surveillance Program (CSP) will be conducted.

tableResults.src: In case of repeated treatments of chronic diseases associated with hepatic, cardiac and renal failure, the corresponding disease has to be monitored prior to administration of VIRBAGEN OMEGA.

tableResults.display_src: Admission Diagnosis: Gallbladder cancer with liver and distant lymph node metastases.

tableResults.display_src: Of the viruses isolated from patients experiencing virologic failure by rebound from the PREZISTA/ rtv 600/ 100 mg b. i. d. group of the POWER and DUET trials, 85% of those susceptible to darunavir at baseline developed decreased susceptibility to darunavir during treatment.
tableResults.ref: Von den aus Patienten mit virologischem Versagen aufgrund des Rebounds aus der PREZISTA/rtv 600/100 mg 2x täglich-Gruppe der POWER- und DUET-Studien isolierten Viren entwickelten 85% derjenigen, die gegen Darunavir zu Studienbeginn empfindlich waren, eine verminderte Empfindlichkeit gegenüber Darunavir während der Behandlung.
tableResults.src: Of the viruses isolated from patients experiencing virologic failure by rebound from the PREZISTA/ rtv 600/ 100 mg b. i. d. group of the POWER and DUET trials, 85% of those susceptible to darunavir at baseline developed decreased susceptibility to darunavir during treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Parameters such as body weight, and the amounts of PCV2 found in some specific lymph nodes and in their blood and faeces, were taken into account.

template.translation_hyp: Sie wurden ins Krankenhaus eingeliefert. Ihre Untersuchung, einschließlich eines CT-Scans des Abdomens sowie Blut- und Urinuntersuchungen, ergab keine Notwendigkeit für eine sofortige Hospitalisierung heute.

baseline.translation_hyp: Ihre Symptome verbesserten sich mit Medikamenten in der Notaufnahme.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms improved with medication in the ED.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation did not show evidence of medical conditions requiring emergent intervention at this time, and your pain improved with medication in the ED.

tableResults.src: When sexual stimulation causes the local release of nitric oxide, inhibition of PDE5 by tadalafil produces increased levels of cGMP in the corpus cavernosum.

tableResults.src: If the area of inflammation was outlined today in the ER, please return to the ER immediately if the area of redness increases beyond that border.

tableResults.src: If you do not have any urine output, or if the urine is cloudy or bloody, call your primary doctor or return to the ER.

tableResults.ref: Zusammen genommen senken diese Wirkungen die Konzentrationen der Hormone im Körper und lindern dadurch die Symptome der Erkrankung.
tableResults.src: Together, these effects reduce the levels of the hormones in the body, improving the symptoms of the disease.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with oral analgesics.

tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a local anesthetic.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit einem Lokalanästhetikum unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a local anesthetic.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with lidocaine patches.

tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with lidocaine patches.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with topical lidocaine patches.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit topischen Lidocain-Pflastern unter Kontrolle gebracht.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with epidural analgesia.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden durch eine epidurale Analgesie unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with epidural analgesia.

tableResults.display_src: After seven weeks, the patient returned to the hospital complaining of newly developed palpable nodules in the left axillary region and aggravated cutaneous lesions in the left upper arm that did not respond to the previous antibiotic therapy.
tableResults.ref: Nach sieben Wochen kehrte der Patient ins Krankenhaus zurück und klagte über neu entstandene tastbare Knötchen im linken Achselbereich und verschlimmerte Hautläsionen im linken Oberarm, die auf die vorherige Antibiotikatherapie nicht ansprachen.
tableResults.src: After seven weeks, the patient returned to the hospital complaining of newly developed palpable nodules in the left axillary region and aggravated cutaneous lesions in the left upper arm that did not respond to the previous antibiotic therapy.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed a high cholesterol level, prompting a need for dietary changes and possibly cholesterol-lowering medications.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat einen hohen Cholesterinspiegel ergeben, der eine Ernährungsumstellung und möglicherweise cholesterinsenkende Medikamente erforderlich macht.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed a high cholesterol level, prompting a need for dietary changes and possibly cholesterol-lowering medications.

tableResults.display_src: When given by inhalation as in Sanohex, salbutamol directly activates the beta2-receptors in the respiratory system.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Salbutamol wie bei Sanohex durch Inhalation verabreicht wird, aktiviert es direkt die Beta-2-Rezeptoren in dem Atemsystem.
tableResults.src: When given by inhalation as in Sanohex, salbutamol directly activates the beta2-receptors in the respiratory system.

tableResults.display_src: The dose, duration of treatment and frequency will depend on the weight and type of animal and condition to be treated.
tableResults.ref: Dosis, Behandlungsdauer und -häufigkeit richten sich nach dem Gewicht und der Art des Tieres sowie der zu behandelnden Erkrankung.
tableResults.src: The dose, duration of treatment and frequency will depend on the weight and type of animal and condition to be treated.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with opioid medication.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit Opioid-Medikamenten unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with opioid medication.

tableResults.display_src: Your pain has been controlled with a fentanyl patch.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Schmerzen wurden mit einem Fentanylpflaster unter Kontrolle gebracht.
tableResults.src: Your pain has been controlled with a fentanyl patch.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms have resolved at the time of your evaluation in the Emergency Department.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Symptome sind zum Zeitpunkt Ihrer Untersuchung in der Notaufnahme abgeklungen.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms have resolved at the time of your evaluation in the Emergency Department.

tableResults.display_src: Your symptoms should resolve within time.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Symptome sollten innerhalb der Zeit verschwinden.
tableResults.src: Your symptoms should resolve within time.

tableResults.display_src: The patient showed significant improvement in her symptoms and there were no further complications observed.
tableResults.ref: Die Patientin zeigte eine deutliche Verbesserung ihrer Symptome und es wurden keine weiteren Komplikationen beobachtet.
tableResults.src: The patient showed significant improvement in her symptoms and there were no further complications observed.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that your symptoms are due to menstrual cramps.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung legt nahe, dass Ihre Symptome auf Menstruationsbeschwerden zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that your symptoms are due to menstrual cramps.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was prescribed albendazole for 3 days, and his symptoms slowly abated 10 days after administration of the drugs.
tableResults.ref: Dem Patienten wurde 3 Tage lang Albendazol verschrieben und seine Symptome ließen 10 Tage nach der Verabreichung der Medikamente langsam nach.
tableResults.src: The patient was prescribed albendazole for 3 days, and his symptoms slowly abated 10 days after administration of the drugs.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that your symptoms are due to a slipped disc in the spine.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung lässt darauf schließen, dass Ihre Symptome auf einen Bandscheibenvorfall in der Wirbelsäule zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that your symptoms are due to a slipped disc in the spine.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was discharged in a stable condition, and her clinical indications improved satisfactorily.
tableResults.ref: Die Patientin wurde in einem stabilen Zustand entlassen und ihre klinischen Indikationen verbesserten sich zufriedenstellend.
tableResults.src: The patient was discharged in a stable condition, and her clinical indications improved satisfactorily.

tableResults.display_src: Patients treated with Humira usually experienced improvement in haematological signs of chronic inflammation.
tableResults.ref: Bei mit Humira behandelten Patienten besserte sich im Allgemeinen die mit einer chronischen Entzündung einhergehende Veränderung der Blutwerte.
tableResults.src: Patients treated with Humira usually experienced improvement in haematological signs of chronic inflammation.

tableResults.display_src: However, his symptoms gradually worsened, and he developed disorientation, hypoxemia, and severe stenosis and occlusion from the right common iliac vein to the junction of the right and left iliac veins.
tableResults.ref: Seine Symptome verschlimmerten sich jedoch allmählich und er entwickelte Orientierungslosigkeit, Hypoxämie sowie eine schwere Stenose und einen Verschluss von der rechten gemeinsamen Beckenvene bis zur Verbindung der rechten und linken Beckenvene.
tableResults.src: However, his symptoms gradually worsened, and he developed disorientation, hypoxemia, and severe stenosis and occlusion from the right common iliac vein to the junction of the right and left iliac veins.

tableResults.display_src: The main measures of effectiveness were the time taken for symptoms to get worse and the number of patients whose symptoms got worse over 24 weeks.
tableResults.ref: Die Hauptindikatoren für die Wirksamkeit waren die Zeit bis zur Verschlimmerung der Symptome und die Anzahl der Patienten, deren Symptome sich im Lauf von 24 Wochen verschlimmerten.
tableResults.src: The main measures of effectiveness were the time taken for symptoms to get worse and the number of patients whose symptoms got worse over 24 weeks.

tableResults.display_src: In placebo-controlled studies, bosentan-related decreases in haemoglobin concentration were not progressive, and stabilised after the first 4– 12 weeks of treatment.
tableResults.ref: In plazebokontrollierten Studien waren die mit Bosentan in Zusammenhang stehenden erniedrigten Hämoglobinkonzentrationen nicht progredient und stabilisierten sich innerhalb der ersten 4 bis 12 Wochen nach Behandlungsbeginn.
tableResults.src: In placebo-controlled studies, bosentan-related decreases in haemoglobin concentration were not progressive, and stabilised after the first 4– 12 weeks of treatment.

tableResults.display_src: Pramipexole doses as published in the literature refer to the salt form.
tableResults.ref: Die in der Literatur veröffentlichten Dosierungen von Pramipexol beziehen sich auf die Salzform.
tableResults.src: Pramipexole doses as published in the literature refer to the salt form.

tableResults.display_src: Your ultrasound and labs show a stable condition of your heart; however, you need to continue with your medication.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Ultraschall und Ihre Laborwerte zeigen einen stabilen Zustand Ihres Herzens; Sie müssen jedoch Ihre Medikamente weiterhin einnehmen.
tableResults.src: Your ultrasound and labs show a stable condition of your heart; however, you need to continue with your medication.

tableResults.display_src: The dose of Kuvan depends on the patient’ s weight.
tableResults.ref: Die Kuvandosis richtet sich nach dem Körpergewicht des Patienten.
tableResults.src: The dose of Kuvan depends on the patient’ s weight.

tableResults.display_src: To minimize scarring reduce sun exposure for the next year by wearing sunscreen, hats and long clothing.
tableResults.ref: Um Narbenbildung zu minimieren, reduzieren Sie die Sonneneinstrahlung im nächsten Jahr durch das Tragen von Sonnenschutzmitteln, Hüten und langer Kleidung.
tableResults.src: To minimize scarring reduce sun exposure for the next year by wearing sunscreen, hats and long clothing.

tableResults.display_src: Plasma levels of conjugates of rotigotine and its desalkyl metabolites increase with impaired renal function.
tableResults.ref: Die Plasmaspiegel der Konjugate von Rotigotin und seiner Desalkylmetaboliten steigen bei eingeschränkter Nierenfunktion an.
tableResults.src: Plasma levels of conjugates of rotigotine and its desalkyl metabolites increase with impaired renal function.

tableResults.display_src: - Canalicular wall demonstrated negative and positive pressure changes with saline-induced narrowing and dilatation.
tableResults.ref: - Die Kanalwand zeigte negative und positive Druckveränderungen mit durch Kochsalzlösung verursachter Verengung und Erweiterung.
tableResults.src: - Canalicular wall demonstrated negative and positive pressure changes with saline-induced narrowing and dilatation.

tableResults.display_src: It limits thrombin formation by inactivating factors Va and VIIIa, thereby providing negative feedback regulation of coagulation.
tableResults.ref: Es begrenzt die Thrombinbildung durch Inaktivierung der Faktoren Va und VIIIa, was zu einer negativen Rückkopplung auf die Blutgerinnung führt.
tableResults.src: It limits thrombin formation by inactivating factors Va and VIIIa, thereby providing negative feedback regulation of coagulation.

tableResults.display_src: Opioids relieve pain by attaching to ‘ opioid receptors ’ in the brain and spinal cord.
tableResults.ref: Opioide lindern Schmerzen, indem sie sich an die sogenannten „ Opioidrezeptoren“ im Gehirn und Rückenmark binden.
tableResults.src: Opioids relieve pain by attaching to ‘ opioid receptors ’ in the brain and spinal cord.

tableResults.src: Severity also increased with high dose therapy (WHO Grade 3 and 4, in 66% and 14% of

tableResults.display_src: Interferon alfa-2b therapy may be initiated if TSH levels can be maintained in the normal range by medication.
tableResults.ref: Eine Interferon alfa- 2b-Therapie kann begonnen werden, wenn der TSH-Spiegel durch Medikation im Normalbereich gehalten werden kann.
tableResults.src: Interferon alfa-2b therapy may be initiated if TSH levels can be maintained in the normal range by medication.

tableResults.display_src: Your physical exam and bone density test reveal early signs of osteoporosis, which can be managed with lifestyle changes and medication.
tableResults.ref: Ihre körperliche Untersuchung und der Knochendichtetest zeigen frühe Anzeichen einer Osteoporose, die durch Änderungen des Lebensstils und Medikamente behandelt werden können.
tableResults.src: Your physical exam and bone density test reveal early signs of osteoporosis, which can be managed with lifestyle changes and medication.

tableResults.display_src: The x-ray of your foot shows early signs of osteoporosis, necessitating a change in diet and possibly medication.

tableResults.src: The x-ray of your foot shows early signs of osteoporosis, necessitating a change in diet and possibly medication.

tableResults.ref: - Epilepsie oder andere Krampfleiden, die sich nicht durch Medikamente kontrollieren lassen
tableResults.src: - epilepsy or other seizure disorders not controlled by medication

tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat ergeben, dass Sie hohen Blutdruck haben, der eine Änderung Ihres Lebensstils und Medikamente erfordert.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed that you have high blood pressure which requires lifestyle modification and medication.

tableResults.display_src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience severe abdominal pain that does not improve with rest or over-the-counter medication.
tableResults.ref: Kehren Sie zur Notaufnahme zurück, wenn Sie starke Bauchschmerzen verspüren, die sich durch Ruhe oder rezeptfreie Medikamente nicht bessern.
tableResults.src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience severe abdominal pain that does not improve with rest or over-the-counter medication.

baseline.translation_hyp: Wir haben Ihnen ein Medikament namens Pepcid (Famotidin) verschrieben, um täglich bei Ihren Bauchschmerzen zu helfen.

tableResults.display_src: We gave you an injection of decadron to help with the inflammation and Benadryl to help with the itching.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben Ihnen eine Injektion mit Decadron gegeben, um die Entzündung zu lindern, und Benadryl, um den Juckreiz zu lindern.
tableResults.src: We gave you an injection of decadron to help with the inflammation and Benadryl to help with the itching.

tableResults.display_src: We have placed an order for a comprehensive cardiac rehabilitation program to help you recover from your heart surgery.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen Auftrag für ein umfassendes Herzrehabilitationsprogramm erteilt, um Sie bei der Genesung nach Ihrer Herzoperation zu unterstützen.
tableResults.src: We have placed an order for a comprehensive cardiac rehabilitation program to help you recover from your heart surgery.

tableResults.display_src: You have been prescribed meclizine to help relieve your symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Ihnen wurde Meclizin verschrieben, um Ihre Symptome zu lindern.
tableResults.src: You have been prescribed meclizine to help relieve your symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: You can take over the counter medications such as dextromethorphan to help manage your symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Sie können rezeptfreie Medikamente wie Dextromethorphan einnehmen, um Ihre Symptome zu lindern.
tableResults.src: You can take over the counter medications such as dextromethorphan to help manage your symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: You can take Mylanta, which is available over the counter, to help manage your symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Sie können Mylanta einnehmen, das rezeptfrei erhältlich ist, um Ihre Symptome zu lindern.
tableResults.src: You can take Mylanta, which is available over the counter, to help manage your symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that you need to follow a high fiber diet to help with your digestion problems.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Bewertung legt nahe, dass Sie eine ballaststoffreiche Ernährung einhalten müssen, um Ihre Verdauungsprobleme zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that you need to follow a high fiber diet to help with your digestion problems.

tableResults.display_src: You can alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain.
tableResults.ref: Sie können Tylenol und Motrin alle 4–6 Stunden abwechseln, um Ihre Schmerzen zu lindern.
tableResults.src: You can alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain.

tableResults.display_src: We have placed an order for a customized diabetic meal plan to help manage your blood sugar levels.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen maßgeschneiderten Ernährungsplan für Diabetiker bestellt, der Sie bei der Kontrolle Ihres Blutzuckerspiegels unterstützen soll.
tableResults.src: We have placed an order for a customized diabetic meal plan to help manage your blood sugar levels.

tableResults.display_src: Aluminium hydroxide-magnesium hydroxide-simethicone antacid/ Efavirenz (30 mL single dose/ 400 mg single dose) Famotidine/ Efavirenz (40 mg single dose/ 400 mg single dose) ANTIANXIETY AGENTS
tableResults.ref: ANTAZIDA Aluminiumhydroxid- Magnesiumhydroxid-Simeticon- Antazid/Efavirenz (30 ml Einmalgabe/400 mg Einmalgabe) Famotidin/Efavirenz (40 mg Einmalgabe/400 mg Einmalgabe)
tableResults.src: Aluminium hydroxide-magnesium hydroxide-simethicone antacid/ Efavirenz (30 mL single dose/ 400 mg single dose) Famotidine/ Efavirenz (40 mg single dose/ 400 mg single dose) ANTIANXIETY AGENTS

tableResults.display_src: In addition, the patient was prescribed metformin, sitagliptin phosphate hydrate, and mitiglinide calcium hydrate to control type 2 diabetes mellitus.
tableResults.ref: Darüber hinaus wurden dem Patienten Metformin, Sitagliptinphosphathydrat und Mitiglinid-Calciumhydrat zur Kontrolle des Typ-2-Diabetes mellitus verschrieben.
tableResults.src: In addition, the patient was prescribed metformin, sitagliptin phosphate hydrate, and mitiglinide calcium hydrate to control type 2 diabetes mellitus.

tableResults.display_src: You can also try Epley Maneuvers at home to help relieve your symptoms- instructions are available online.
tableResults.ref: Sie können Epley-Manöver auch zu Hause ausprobieren, um Ihre Symptome zu lindern – Anweisungen sind online verfügbar.
tableResults.src: You can also try Epley Maneuvers at home to help relieve your symptoms- instructions are available online.

tableResults.display_src: You should alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain.
tableResults.ref: Sie sollten Tylenol und Motrin alle 4–6 Stunden abwechseln, um Ihre Schmerzen zu kontrollieren.
tableResults.src: You should alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain.

tableResults.display_src: We have placed an order for a personalized exercise and weight loss plan to help you achieve a healthier lifestyle.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben einen personalisierten Trainings- und Gewichtsverlustplan in Auftrag gegeben, der Ihnen dabei helfen soll, einen gesünderen Lebensstil zu erreichen.
tableResults.src: We have placed an order for a personalized exercise and weight loss plan to help you achieve a healthier lifestyle.

tableResults.display_src: We did not find any dangerous cause of your abdominal pain.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben keine gefährliche Ursache für Ihre Bauchschmerzen gefunden.
tableResults.src: We did not find any dangerous cause of your abdominal pain.

tableResults.display_src: Your abdominal pain has not improved.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Bauchschmerzen haben sich nicht verbessert.
tableResults.src: Your abdominal pain has not improved.

tableResults.display_src: Please follow up with the Gastroenterology Clinic to monitor your abdominal pain and digestive issues.
tableResults.ref: Bitte wenden Sie sich an die Klinik für Gastroenterologie, um Ihre Bauchschmerzen und Verdauungsprobleme zu überwachen.
tableResults.src: Please follow up with the Gastroenterology Clinic to monitor your abdominal pain and digestive issues.

tableResults.display_src: You have been evaluated in the Emergency Department today for your abdominal pain after a fall.
tableResults.ref: Sie wurden heute in der Notaufnahme auf Ihre Bauchschmerzen nach einem Sturz untersucht.
tableResults.src: You have been evaluated in the Emergency Department today for your abdominal pain after a fall.

tableResults.display_src: We have placed an order for a series of counseling sessions to support your mental health and well-being.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben eine Reihe von Beratungsgesprächen zur Unterstützung Ihrer psychischen Gesundheit und Ihres Wohlbefindens in Auftrag gegeben.
tableResults.src: We have placed an order for a series of counseling sessions to support your mental health and well-being.

tableResults.display_src: You have been evaluated in the Emergency Department today for your cramping abdominal pain.
tableResults.ref: Sie wurden heute in der Notaufnahme auf Ihre krampfartigen Bauchschmerzen untersucht.
tableResults.src: You have been evaluated in the Emergency Department today for your cramping abdominal pain.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor has prescribed TESAVEL to help lower your blood sugar, which is too high because of your type 2 diabetes.
tableResults.ref: Ihr Arzt hat Ihnen TESAVEL als zusätzliche Maßnahme zur Blutzuckersenkung verordnet, da aufgrund Ihres Typ-2-Diabetes Ihr Blutzuckerspiegel zu hoch ist.
tableResults.src: Your doctor has prescribed TESAVEL to help lower your blood sugar, which is too high because of your type 2 diabetes.

tableResults.display_src: Each dose contains 5 micrograms exenatide.
tableResults.ref: Jede Dosis enthält 5 Mikrogramm Exenatide.
tableResults.src: Each dose contains 5 micrograms exenatide.

tableResults.display_src: You have been given medications including steroids, epinephrine, and benadryl to control your swelling.
tableResults.ref: Ihnen wurden Medikamente wie Steroide, Adrenalin und Benadryl verabreicht, um Ihre Schwellung zu kontrollieren.
tableResults.src: You have been given medications including steroids, epinephrine, and benadryl to control your swelling.

tableResults.display_src: Gemcitabine (difluoro- deoxy-cytidine (dFdC)) is a cytotoxic anti-cancer agent, which exhibits cell phase specificity, primarily killing cells undergoing DNA synthesis (S-phase) and under certain conditions blocking the progression of cells through the G 1/S phase boundary.
tableResults.ref: Gemcitabin (Difluordeoxycytidin [dFdC]) ist ein Zytostatikum zur Behandlung von Krebserkrankungen, das aufgrund seiner zellzyklusphasenspezifischen Wirkung Zellen hauptsächlich während der Phase der DNS-Synthese (S-Phase) abtötet und unter bestimmten Bedingungen auch den Übergang der Zellen von der G 1-Phase in die S-Phase blockiert.
tableResults.src: Gemcitabine (difluoro- deoxy-cytidine (dFdC)) is a cytotoxic anti-cancer agent, which exhibits cell phase specificity, primarily killing cells undergoing DNA synthesis (S-phase) and under certain conditions blocking the progression of cells through the G 1/S phase boundary.

tableResults.display_src: Famotidine is available over-the-counter without a prescription.
tableResults.ref: Famotidin ist rezeptfrei und ohne Rezept erhältlich.
tableResults.src: Famotidine is available over-the-counter without a prescription.

tableResults.display_src: We think your abdominal pain is due to irritable bowel syndrome.
tableResults.ref: Wir gehen davon aus, dass Ihre Bauchschmerzen auf ein Reizdarmsyndrom zurückzuführen sind.
tableResults.src: We think your abdominal pain is due to irritable bowel syndrome.

tableResults.display_src: You can alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain as directed on the package.
tableResults.ref: Sie können Tylenol und Motrin alle 4–6 Stunden abwechseln, um Ihre Schmerzen zu lindern, wie auf der Packung angegeben.
tableResults.src: You can alternate Tylenol and Motrin every 4-6 hours to help control your pain as directed on the package.

tableResults.display_src: Additional messages regarding the transition plan for replacement of ReFacto with ReFacto AF in the Member State(s).
tableResults.ref: • zusätzliche Mitteilungen hinsichtlich der Übergangspläne, um ReFacto in den Mitgliedsstaaten/im Mitgliedsstaat durch ReFacto AF zu ersetzen.
tableResults.src: Additional messages regarding the transition plan for replacement of ReFacto with ReFacto AF in the Member State(s).

tableResults.display_src: We did an electrocardiogram (ECG) to monitor your heart.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben ein Elektrokardiogramm (EKG) zur Überwachung Ihres Herzens erstellt.
tableResults.src: We did an electrocardiogram (ECG) to monitor your heart.

tableResults.display_src: In the hospital, we gave you gabapentin for managing your nerve pain and controlling seizures.
tableResults.ref: Im Krankenhaus haben wir Ihnen Gabapentin gegeben, um Ihre Nervenschmerzen zu lindern und Anfälle zu kontrollieren.
tableResults.src: In the hospital, we gave you gabapentin for managing your nerve pain and controlling seizures.

tableResults.display_src: In the hospital, we gave you atorvastatin for lowering your cholesterol levels and reducing the risk of heart disease.
tableResults.ref: Im Krankenhaus haben wir Ihnen Atorvastatin verabreicht, um Ihren Cholesterinspiegel zu senken und das Risiko einer Herzerkrankung zu verringern.
tableResults.src: In the hospital, we gave you atorvastatin for lowering your cholesterol levels and reducing the risk of heart disease.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you continue using your prescribed eye drops twice a day.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, Ihre verschriebenen Augentropfen weiterhin zweimal täglich zu verwenden.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you continue using your prescribed eye drops twice a day.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you increase your intake of vitamin A-rich foods to improve your eye health.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, die Aufnahme von Vitamin A-reichen Lebensmitteln zu erhöhen, um Ihre Augengesundheit zu verbessern.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you increase your intake of vitamin A-rich foods to improve your eye health.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you start using lubricating eye drops to alleviate symptoms of dry eyes.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, mit der Verwendung von befeuchtenden Augentropfen zu beginnen, um die Symptome trockener Augen zu lindern.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you start using lubricating eye drops to alleviate symptoms of dry eyes.

tableResults.display_src: We gave you Amlodipine to increase your blood pressure management and reduce hypertension.
tableResults.ref: Wir haben Ihnen Amlodipin gegeben, um Ihre Blutdruckkontrolle zu verbessern und Bluthochdruck zu senken.
tableResults.src: We gave you Amlodipine to increase your blood pressure management and reduce hypertension.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you schedule a follow-up appointment in one month to monitor your progress.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, einen Folgetermin in einem Monat zu vereinbaren, um Ihre Fortschritte zu überwachen.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you schedule a follow-up appointment in one month to monitor your progress.

tableResults.display_src: Bepridil Lidocaine (systemic) Quinidine (saquinavir/ ritonavir) Amiodarone flecainide propafenone (saquinavir/ ritonavir) Anticoagulant
tableResults.ref: Bepridil Lidocain (systemisch) Chinidin (Saquinavir/Ritonavir)
tableResults.src: Bepridil Lidocaine (systemic) Quinidine (saquinavir/ ritonavir) Amiodarone flecainide propafenone (saquinavir/ ritonavir) Anticoagulant

tableResults.display_src: The studies compared NovoRapid to human insulin by measuring over 6 months the level of glycosylated haemoglobin (HbA1c) which gives an indication of how well the blood glucose is controlled.
tableResults.ref: In den Studien wurde NovoRapid mit Humaninsulin verglichen, indem sechs Monate lang die Konzentration von glykosyliertem Hämoglobin (HbA1c) gemessen wurde, die anzeigt, wie gut der Blutzucker eingestellt ist.
tableResults.src: The studies compared NovoRapid to human insulin by measuring over 6 months the level of glycosylated haemoglobin (HbA1c) which gives an indication of how well the blood glucose is controlled.

tableResults.display_src: Corlentor is used in patients with a normal sinus rhythm (heartbeat), who cannot take, or cannot tolerate, beta-blockers (another type of medicine to treat angina).
tableResults.ref: Corlentor wird bei Patienten mit normalem Sinusrhythmus (Herzschlag) verwendet, die keine Betablocker (eine andere Art von Medikamenten zur Behandlung der Angina pectoris) einnehmen können oder diese nicht vertragen.
tableResults.src: Corlentor is used in patients with a normal sinus rhythm (heartbeat), who cannot take, or cannot tolerate, beta-blockers (another type of medicine to treat angina).

tableResults.display_src: Alitretinoin was shown to have a weak potential to be a photo-irritant based on histidine and photoprotein binding.
tableResults.ref: Es wurde gezeigt, dass Alitretinoin aufgrund einer Histidin- und Photoproteinbindung ein schwaches Potential als Lichtreizstoff besitzt.
tableResults.src: Alitretinoin was shown to have a weak potential to be a photo-irritant based on histidine and photoprotein binding.

tableResults.display_src: Both of them were double-blind, positive-controlled, randomised, parallel group, multi-centre studies designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy of lansoprazole 15 mg and 30 mg o.d. in comparison to ranitidine 150 mg b.d.
tableResults.ref: Bei beiden handelte es um multizentrische, positiv kontrollierte, randomisierte, in Parallelgruppen durchgeführte Doppelblindstudien, bei denen die Sicherheit und Wirksamkeit von Lansoprazol 15 mg und 30 mg o.d. im Vergleich zu Ranitidin 150 mg b.d. bewertet wurde.
tableResults.src: Both of them were double-blind, positive-controlled, randomised, parallel group, multi-centre studies designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy of lansoprazole 15 mg and 30 mg o.d. in comparison to ranitidine 150 mg b.d.

tableResults.display_src: Increased plasma concentrations of amiodarone, bepridil, encainide, flecanide, propafenone, quinidine.
tableResults.ref: erhöhte Plasmakonzentrationen von Amiodaron, Bepridil, Encainid, Flecainid, Propafenon, Chinidin.
tableResults.src: Increased plasma concentrations of amiodarone, bepridil, encainide, flecanide, propafenone, quinidine.

tableResults.display_src: Tizanidine must not be administered together with ciprofloxacin (see section 4.3).
tableResults.ref: Tizanidin darf nicht zusammen mit Ciprofloxacin verabreicht werden (siehe Abschnitt 4.3).
tableResults.src: Tizanidine must not be administered together with ciprofloxacin (see section 4.3).

tableResults.display_src: If your levels of the red blood pigment (haemoglobin) are too high you should not receive Binocrit, since you have an increased risk of blood clotting after the surgery.
tableResults.ref: Wenn Ihre Werte des roten Blutfarbstoffs (Hämoglobin) zu hoch sind, sollten Sie Binocrit nicht erhalten, da ein erhöhtes Risiko für Blutpfropfbildung nach der Operation besteht.
tableResults.src: If your levels of the red blood pigment (haemoglobin) are too high you should not receive Binocrit, since you have an increased risk of blood clotting after the surgery.

tableResults.display_src: Do not take Ciprofloxacin Bayer together with tizanidine, because this may cause side effects such as low blood pressure and sleepiness (see Section 2:
tableResults.ref: 354 Nehmen Sie Ciprofloxacin Bayer und Tizanidin nicht zusammen ein, da dies Nebenwirkungen wie niedrigen Blutdruck und Schläfrigkeit verursachen kann (siehe Abschnitt 2:
tableResults.src: Do not take Ciprofloxacin Bayer together with tizanidine, because this may cause side effects such as low blood pressure and sleepiness (see Section 2:

tableResults.display_src: Do not take omeprazole and ranitidine at the same time.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie Omeprazol und Ranitidin nicht gleichzeitig ein.
tableResults.src: Do not take omeprazole and ranitidine at the same time.

tableResults.display_src: methoxypoly(oxyethylen)-40 sodium salt (MPEG-DSPE), fully hydrogenated soy phosphatidylcholine (HSPC), cholesterol, ammonium sulphate, sucrose, histidine, water for injections, hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide.
tableResults.ref: carbamoyl)-ω -methoxypoly(oxyethylen)-40 Natriumsalz (MPEG-DSPE), vollhydriertes Phosphatidylcholin aus Sojabohnen (HSPC), Cholesterol, Ammoniumsulfat, Saccharose, Histidin, Wasser für Injektionszwecke, Salzsäure und Natriumhydroxid.
tableResults.src: methoxypoly(oxyethylen)-40 sodium salt (MPEG-DSPE), fully hydrogenated soy phosphatidylcholine (HSPC), cholesterol, ammonium sulphate, sucrose, histidine, water for injections, hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide.

tableResults.display_src: Based on the laboratory investigations, the patient was diagnosed with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) and treated with prednisone, naproxen, and hydroxychloroquine.
tableResults.ref: Basierend auf den Laboruntersuchungen wurde bei dem Patienten systemischer Lupus erythematodes (SLE) diagnostiziert und er wurde mit Prednison, Naproxen und Hydroxychloroquin behandelt.
tableResults.src: Based on the laboratory investigations, the patient was diagnosed with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) and treated with prednisone, naproxen, and hydroxychloroquine.

tableResults.display_src: It is phosphorylated by cellular kinases to stavudine triphosphate which inhibits HIV reverse transcriptase by competing with the natural substrate, thymidine triphosphate.
tableResults.ref: Es wird durch zelluläre Kinasen zu Stavudintriphosphat phosphoryliert, welches als kompetitiver Hemmstoff des natürlichen Substrats Thymidintriphosphat die HIV reverse Transkriptase inhibiert.
tableResults.src: It is phosphorylated by cellular kinases to stavudine triphosphate which inhibits HIV reverse transcriptase by competing with the natural substrate, thymidine triphosphate.

tableResults.display_src: However, the patient developed anorexia and teriparatide was stopped at 3 months after the surgery.
tableResults.ref: Allerdings entwickelte der Patient Anorexie und Teriparatid wurde 3 Monate nach der Operation abgesetzt.
tableResults.src: However, the patient developed anorexia and teriparatide was stopped at 3 months after the surgery.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation suggests that you should continue using your inhaler as directed to manage your asthma symptoms.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Bewertung legt nahe, dass Sie Ihren Inhalator weiterhin wie angegeben verwenden sollten, um Ihre Asthmasymptome zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation suggests that you should continue using your inhaler as directed to manage your asthma symptoms.

tableResults.display_src: Fentanyl-ratio 100 µg/ h, dispositif transdermique
tableResults.ref: Fentanyl-ratio 100 µg/h, dispositif transdermique
tableResults.src: Fentanyl-ratio 100 µg/ h, dispositif transdermique

tableResults.display_src: darunavir/ ritonavir (DRV/ rtv), investigator-selected N(t)RTIs and optional enfuvirtide (ENF).
tableResults.ref: Darunavir/Ritonavir (DRV/rtv), durch den Prüfarzt gewählte N(t)RTIs und optional Enfuvirtid (ENF).
tableResults.src: darunavir/ ritonavir (DRV/ rtv), investigator-selected N(t)RTIs and optional enfuvirtide (ENF).

tableResults.display_src: Three months after the suspension of Tofacitinib, the patient maintained stable repilation.
tableResults.ref: Drei Monate nach Absetzen von Tofacitinib behielt der Patient eine stabile Repilation bei.
tableResults.src: Three months after the suspension of Tofacitinib, the patient maintained stable repilation.

tableResults.display_src: Enfuvirtide use in OBT in enfuvirtide-naïve patients was counted as one active drug in OBT.
tableResults.ref: Enfuvirtid-Anwendung in der OBT bei Enfuvirtid-naïven Patienten wurde als ein aktiver Wirkstoff der OBT gewertet.
tableResults.src: Enfuvirtide use in OBT in enfuvirtide-naïve patients was counted as one active drug in OBT.

tableResults.display_src: Your evaluation has revealed a mild form of anemia, hence we recommend dietary changes and iron supplements.
tableResults.ref: Ihre Untersuchung hat eine leichte Form der Anämie ergeben, daher empfehlen wir eine Ernährungsumstellung und Eisenpräparate.
tableResults.src: Your evaluation has revealed a mild form of anemia, hence we recommend dietary changes and iron supplements.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you sleep for at least 7-8 hours a day to give your eyes adequate rest.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, mindestens 7–8 Stunden am Tag zu schlafen, um Ihren Augen ausreichend Ruhe zu gönnen.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you sleep for at least 7-8 hours a day to give your eyes adequate rest.

tableResults.display_src: Medicines that can decrease blood levels of posaconazole include: • Rifabutin and rifampicin (used to treat certain infections).
tableResults.ref: Zu den Arzneimitteln, die den Posaconazol-Blutspiegel absenken können, gehören: • Rifabutin und Rifampicin (zur Behandlung von bestimmten Infektionen).
tableResults.src: Medicines that can decrease blood levels of posaconazole include: • Rifabutin and rifampicin (used to treat certain infections).

tableResults.display_src: Rifabutin is an inducer and substrate of CYP3A4.
tableResults.ref: Rifabutin ist ein Induktor und Substrat von CYP3A4.
tableResults.src: Rifabutin is an inducer and substrate of CYP3A4.

tableResults.display_src: The receptors are also found in adipocytes (fat tissue). ina
tableResults.ref: Die Rezeptoren sind ebenfalls in den Adipozyten (den Fettzellen im Fettgewebe) zu Arz
tableResults.src: The receptors are also found in adipocytes (fat tissue). ina

tableResults.display_src: Insuman Comb 50 is a fluid (suspension) for injection under the skin.
tableResults.ref: Insuman Comb 50 ist eine Flüssigkeit (Suspension) zum Spritzen unter die Haut.
tableResults.src: Insuman Comb 50 is a fluid (suspension) for injection under the skin.

tableResults.display_src: The patient's nausea, vomiting and abdominal pain resolved the next day and liver enzyme levels stabilized.
tableResults.ref: Die Übelkeit, das Erbrechen und die Bauchschmerzen des Patienten verschwanden am nächsten Tag und die Leberenzymwerte stabilisierten sich.
tableResults.src: The patient's nausea, vomiting and abdominal pain resolved the next day and liver enzyme levels stabilized.

tableResults.display_src: Luteal phase support may be considered since lack of substances with luteotrophic activity (LH/ hCG) after ovulation may lead to premature failure of the corpus luteum.
tableResults.ref: Eine Unterstützung der Lutealphase kann in Betracht gezogen werden, da nach der Ovulation ein Mangel an luteotropen Substanzen (LH / hCG) zu einer frühen Corpus-Luteum-Insuffizienz führen kann.
tableResults.src: Luteal phase support may be considered since lack of substances with luteotrophic activity (LH/ hCG) after ovulation may lead to premature failure of the corpus luteum.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor may give you another medicine to control diarrhoea. • Muscle pain • Tiredness • Headache • Herpes zoster infection (including disseminated)
tableResults.ref: Möglicherweise verschreibt Ihnen Ihr Arzt ein zusätzliches Arzneimittel, um den Durchfall zu behandeln. • Muskelschmerz • Müdigkeit • Kopfschmerz • Herpes-Zoster-Infektion (einschließlich ausgedehnte Verbreitung)
tableResults.src: Your doctor may give you another medicine to control diarrhoea. • Muscle pain • Tiredness • Headache • Herpes zoster infection (including disseminated)

tableResults.src: Return to the Emergency Department if you experience severe abdominal pain that does not improve with rest or over-the-counter medication.

tableResults.src: You have been given pain medication to help control your pain.

tableResults.display_src: To reduce the symptoms of arthritis: Engage in low-impact exercises, apply heat or cold therapy, and maintain a healthy weight to reduce joint stress.
tableResults.ref: Um die Symptome von Arthritis zu lindern: Machen Sie sanfte Übungen, wenden Sie eine Wärme- oder Kältetherapie an und halten Sie ein gesundes Gewicht, um die Belastung der Gelenke zu reduzieren.
tableResults.src: To reduce the symptoms of arthritis: Engage in low-impact exercises, apply heat or cold therapy, and maintain a healthy weight to reduce joint stress.

tableResults.display_src: Take loratadine to decrease allergy symptoms such as sneezing and itching.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie Loratadin ein, um allergische Symptome wie Niesen und Juckreiz zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Take loratadine to decrease allergy symptoms such as sneezing and itching.

tableResults.display_src: Take docusate sodium to decrease constipation.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie Docusat-Natrium ein, um Verstopfung zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Take docusate sodium to decrease constipation.

tableResults.display_src: Take prochlorperazine to lessen nausea.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie Prochlorperazin ein, um Übelkeit zu lindern.
tableResults.src: Take prochlorperazine to lessen nausea.

tableResults.display_src: Take furosemide for reducing fluid retention and swelling.
tableResults.ref: Nehmen Sie Furosemid ein, um Flüssigkeitsansammlungen und Schwellungen zu reduzieren.
tableResults.src: Take furosemide for reducing fluid retention and swelling.

tableResults.display_src: It can also be used in patients at high risk (because of their age or disease) when they have abdominal surgery, especially for cancer, or when they are forced to stay in bed because of an acute illness.
tableResults.ref: Es kann auch bei Patienten mit hohem Risiko (aufgrund ihres Alters oder ihrer Erkrankung) angewendet werden, die, insbesondere zur Behandlung von Krebs, am Bauch operiert werden oder aufgrund einer akuten Krankheit bettlägerig sind.
tableResults.src: It can also be used in patients at high risk (because of their age or disease) when they have abdominal surgery, especially for cancer, or when they are forced to stay in bed because of an acute illness.

tableResults.display_src: You have been started on a blood thinning medication to help the blood clot break down.
tableResults.ref: Sie haben mit der Einnahme eines blutverdünnenden Medikaments begonnen, um die Auflösung des Blutgerinnsels zu unterstützen.
tableResults.src: You have been started on a blood thinning medication to help the blood clot break down.

tableResults.display_src: Apply antibiotic (Neosporin) ointment daily.
tableResults.ref: Tragen Sie täglich eine Antibiotika-Salbe (Neosporin) auf.
tableResults.src: Apply antibiotic (Neosporin) ointment daily.

tableResults.display_src: The patient is advised to follow up with their primary care physician to manage their COPD, IHD, hypertension, and rib fractures.
tableResults.ref: Dem Patienten wird empfohlen, sich an seinen Hausarzt zu wenden, um seine COPD, IHD, Bluthochdruck und Rippenfrakturen zu behandeln.
tableResults.src: The patient is advised to follow up with their primary care physician to manage their COPD, IHD, hypertension, and rib fractures.

tableResults.display_src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you wear your glasses at all times to prevent further deterioration of your vision.
tableResults.ref: Nach der Beurteilung durch unsere Augenärzte empfehlen diese Ihnen, Ihre Brille immer zu tragen, um einer weiteren Verschlechterung Ihrer Sehkraft vorzubeugen.
tableResults.src: After evaluation by our eye doctors, they recommend you wear your glasses at all times to prevent further deterioration of your vision.

tableResults.display_src: You have been prescribed lactulose.
tableResults.ref: Ihnen wurde Lactulose verschrieben.
tableResults.src: You have been prescribed lactulose.

tableResults.display_src: The patient had already been undergoing immunosuppressive therapy with corticosteroids, and infliximab was prescribed, which led to progressive clinical improvement until almost complete remission after eight treatment cycles.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient hatte sich bereits einer immunsuppressiven Therapie mit Kortikosteroiden unterzogen und ihm wurde Infliximab verschrieben, was zu einer fortschreitenden klinischen Besserung bis hin zu einer nahezu vollständigen Remission nach acht Behandlungszyklen führte.
tableResults.src: The patient had already been undergoing immunosuppressive therapy with corticosteroids, and infliximab was prescribed, which led to progressive clinical improvement until almost complete remission after eight treatment cycles.

tableResults.display_src: IVIG was prescribed again on the 49th day of the disease, and the acetylsalicylic acid dose was increased to 80 mg/kg.
tableResults.ref: Am 49. Krankheitstag wurde erneut IVIG verordnet und die Acetylsalicylsäure-Dosis auf 80 mg/kg erhöht.
tableResults.src: IVIG was prescribed again on the 49th day of the disease, and the acetylsalicylic acid dose was increased to 80 mg/kg.

tableResults.display_src: He had previously been prescribed omeprazole to exclude gastric oesophageal reflux disease as a potential cause; however, this was ineffective.
tableResults.ref: Ihm war zuvor Omeprazol verschrieben worden, um eine Magen-Refluxkrankheit als mögliche Ursache auszuschließen; Dies war jedoch wirkungslos.
tableResults.src: He had previously been prescribed omeprazole to exclude gastric oesophageal reflux disease as a potential cause; however, this was ineffective.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was prescribed albendazole for 3 days, and his symptoms slowly abated 10 days after administration of the drugs.
tableResults.ref: Dem Patienten wurde 3 Tage lang Albendazol verschrieben und seine Symptome ließen 10 Tage nach der Verabreichung der Medikamente langsam nach.
tableResults.src: The patient was prescribed albendazole for 3 days, and his symptoms slowly abated 10 days after administration of the drugs.

tableResults.display_src: SPRYCEL is a leukaemia treatment for adults with chronic myeloid leukaemia (CML) who are not benefiting from imatinib therapy.
tableResults.ref: SPRYCEL wird zur Behandlung der Leukämie bei Erwachsenen mit chronischer myeloischer Leukämie (CML) eingesetzt, die nicht von einer Behandlung mit Imatinib profitieren.
tableResults.src: SPRYCEL is a leukaemia treatment for adults with chronic myeloid leukaemia (CML) who are not benefiting from imatinib therapy.

tableResults.display_src: It is not clear what is causing your unrelenting abdominal pain.
tableResults.ref: Es ist nicht klar, was die Ursache für Ihre anhaltenden Bauchschmerzen ist.
tableResults.src: It is not clear what is causing your unrelenting abdominal pain.

tableResults.display_src: Maintenance treatment: one vial of DepoCyte (50 mg) administered every 28 days for 4 doses (weeks 17, 21, 25 and 29).
tableResults.ref: Eine Durchstechflasche DepoCyte (50 mg) wird insgesamt viermal im Abstand von 28 Tagen (Woche 17, 21, 25 und 29) gegeben.
tableResults.src: Maintenance treatment: one vial of DepoCyte (50 mg) administered every 28 days for 4 doses (weeks 17, 21, 25 and 29).

tableResults.display_src: Each 1 g vial contains 1g ceftriaxone (as hydrated disodium).
tableResults.ref: Jede 1 g Durchstechflasche enthält 1g Ceftriaxon (als Dinatrium-Hydrat).
tableResults.src: Each 1 g vial contains 1g ceftriaxone (as hydrated disodium).

tableResults.display_src: TRACTOCILE contains atosiban (INN), a synthetic peptide ([Mpa1, D-Tyr(Et)2, Thr4, Orn8]-oxytocin) which is a competitive antagonist of human oxytocin at receptor level.
tableResults.ref: TRACTOCILE enthält Atosiban (INN), ein synthetisches Peptid ([Mpa1, D-Tyr(Et)2, Thr4, Orn8]- Oxytocin), das als kompetitiver Antagonist von humanem Oxytocin auf Rezeptorebene wirkt.
tableResults.src: TRACTOCILE contains atosiban (INN), a synthetic peptide ([Mpa1, D-Tyr(Et)2, Thr4, Orn8]-oxytocin) which is a competitive antagonist of human oxytocin at receptor level.

tableResults.display_src: 14 Remain seated or lying down for 20 minutes after injecting Ceplene.
tableResults.ref: Bleiben Sie 20 Minuten nach der Injektion von Ceplene sitzen oder liegen.
tableResults.src: 14 Remain seated or lying down for 20 minutes after injecting Ceplene.

tableResults.display_src: You will be given a prescription for antibiotics, please take the antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.
tableResults.ref: Sie erhalten ein Rezept für Antibiotika. Bitte nehmen Sie die Antibiotika während der gesamten Einnahmedauer wie verordnet ein.
tableResults.src: You will be given a prescription for antibiotics, please take the antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.

tableResults.display_src: You have been given a prescription for steroids, please take them as directed.
tableResults.ref: Sie haben ein Rezept für Steroide erhalten. Bitte nehmen Sie diese wie verordnet ein.
tableResults.src: You have been given a prescription for steroids, please take them as directed.

tableResults.display_src: Use the medications prescribed as directed.
tableResults.ref: Verwenden Sie die verschriebenen Medikamente wie angegeben.
tableResults.src: Use the medications prescribed as directed.

tableResults.display_src: Please take the prescribed antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.
tableResults.ref: Bitte nehmen Sie die verschriebenen Antibiotika während der gesamten Einnahmedauer wie angegeben ein.
tableResults.src: Please take the prescribed antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.

tableResults.display_src: She should take the prescribed medication as directed and follow up if any symptoms develop.
tableResults.ref: Sie sollte die verschriebenen Medikamente wie verordnet einnehmen und bei Auftreten von Symptomen weiterbeobachten.
tableResults.src: She should take the prescribed medication as directed and follow up if any symptoms develop.

tableResults.display_src: The patient was treated successfully with 20 mg bepotastine and received a prescription for 10 mg bepotastine once a day.
tableResults.ref: Der Patient wurde erfolgreich mit 20 mg Bepotastin behandelt und erhielt ein Rezept für 10 mg Bepotastin einmal täglich.
tableResults.src: The patient was treated successfully with 20 mg bepotastine and received a prescription for 10 mg bepotastine once a day.

tableResults.display_src: Please take your prescribed antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.
tableResults.ref: Bitte nehmen Sie Ihre verschriebenen Antibiotika während der gesamten Einnahmedauer wie angegeben ein.
tableResults.src: Please take your prescribed antibiotics as directed for the full course of the medication.

tableResults.display_src: Although the degree of renal impairment has no demonstrable effect on the pharmacokinetic disposition of Ceplene, caution is warranted when Ceplene is administered to patients with severe renal impairment.
tableResults.ref: Der Grad der Niereninsuffizienz hat zwar keinen nachweisbaren Effekt auf die pharmakokinetische Disposition von Ceplene, aber dennoch ist Vorsicht geboten, wenn Ceplene Patienten mit schwerer Niereninsuffizienz gegeben wird.
tableResults.src: Although the degree of renal impairment has no demonstrable effect on the pharmacokinetic disposition of Ceplene, caution is warranted when Ceplene is administered to patients with severe renal impairment.

tableResults.display_src: Transparent and colourless patch with blue imprint on the backing foil: “ fentanyl 75 µg/ h“.
tableResults.ref: Transparentes farbloses Pflaster mit dem blauen Aufdruck „ fentanyl 75 µg/h“ auf der Trägerfolie.
tableResults.src: Transparent and colourless patch with blue imprint on the backing foil: “ fentanyl 75 µg/ h“.

tableResults.display_src: Interleukin-2 (IL-2) IL-2 is administered twice daily as a subcutaneous injection 1 to 3 minutes prior to the administration of Ceplene; each dose of IL-2 is 16 400 IU/ kg.
tableResults.ref: Interleukin-2 (IL-2) IL-2 wird zweimal täglich als subkutane Injektion 1 bis 3 Minuten vor der Gabe von Ceplene gegeben; jede Dosis von IL-2 beträgt 16 400 IE/kg.
tableResults.src: Interleukin-2 (IL-2) IL-2 is administered twice daily as a subcutaneous injection 1 to 3 minutes prior to the administration of Ceplene; each dose of IL-2 is 16 400 IU/ kg.

tableResults.display_src: Your doctor may advise you that it is appropriate to use a syringe pump to regulate the injection of Ceplene.
tableResults.ref: 25 Ihr Arzt rät Ihnen möglicherweise, dass die Verwendung einer Spritzenpumpe angebracht ist, um die Injektion von Ceplene zu regulieren.
tableResults.src: Your doctor may advise you that it is appropriate to use a syringe pump to regulate the injection of Ceplene.

tableResults.display_src: There have been 2 clinical studies to evaluate the use of Ceplene in the maintenance of remission in adult AML patients.
tableResults.ref: Es wurden 2 klinische Studien durchgeführt, um die Anwendung von Ceplene für die Aufrechterhaltung der Remission bei erwachsenen AML-Patienten zu bewerten.
tableResults.src: There have been 2 clinical studies to evaluate the use of Ceplene in the maintenance of remission in adult AML patients.

tableResults.display_src: Adverse reactions were reported to be at least possibly related to IL-2 and Ceplene treatment in almost all patients in studies in acute myeloid leukaemia (AML).
tableResults.ref: Nebenwirkungen, die zumindest möglicherweise durch die Behandlung mit IL-2 und Ceplene bedingt sind, wurden bei fast allen Patienten in Studien über akute myeloische Leukämie (AML) berichtet.
tableResults.src: Adverse reactions were reported to be at least possibly related to IL-2 and Ceplene treatment in almost all patients in studies in acute myeloid leukaemia (AML).

tableResults.display_src: For both men and women using this treatment, contraception must be used as it is important not to conceive a child while being treated with Ceplene and IL-2.
tableResults.ref: Sowohl Männer als auch Frauen, die diese Behandlung anwenden, müssen eine Empfängnisverhütungsmethode anwenden, da es wichtig ist, während der Behandlung mit Ceplene und IL-2 kein Kind zu empfangen bzw. zu zeugen.
tableResults.src: For both men and women using this treatment, contraception must be used as it is important not to conceive a child while being treated with Ceplene and IL-2.

tableResults.display_src: The summary of opinion of the Committee for Orphan Medicinal Products for Ceplene is available here.
tableResults.ref: Die Zusammenfassung des Gutachtens des Ausschusses für Arzneimittel für seltene Leiden zu Ceplene finden Sie hier.
tableResults.src: The summary of opinion of the Committee for Orphan Medicinal Products for Ceplene is available here.
